Product Name: Vango Sunlight Air ProShield 2-in-1 Awning & Sun Canopy
Product Description:
Vango Sunlight Air ProShield 2-in-1 Awning & Sun Canopy

An Adaptable Awning

The Vango Sunlight Air ProShield Awning is a versatile 2-in-1 awning. The full enclosed awning can easily convert into a sun canopy by removing the the front door and side walls. When the walls and doors are in place, the clear windows have roll-away curtains for added privacy. With a Kador height of 235cm - 250cm, this awning is suitable for medium height campervans, motorhomes and caravans. Its single AirBeam structure ensures quick and easy pitching with the included pump, while its durable 300D Elements ProShield fabric provides excellent weather protection, with a hydrostatic head of 6,000mm. With multiple attachment options and a compact design, the Vango Sunlight Air ProShield is ideal for campers seeking a flexible outdoor space.

Vango Sunlight Air ProShield Features

  • Inflates quickly as only one beam needs to inflate. The main beam has attached bracer beams for stability.
  • Elements ProShield material is robust, durable and waterproof. 300D fabric with an HH rating of 6,000MM.
  • Flexible SkyTrack II hanging system which allows you to easily attach lighting or storage.
  • Adjustable pegging system allows awning to be pitched perfectly on uneven surfaces.
  • Removable zipped doors and walls allow it to change to a sun canopy.
  • ColourLok technology to aid colour retention from sun exposure.
  • Includes carry bag, steel rock pegs and pump.
  • Zipped privacy curtains on all windows fit to the flysheet with no gaps and simply rolls down into a pocket when not required

Awning & Sun Canopy Specification

  • Weight: 17.9kg
  • Pitching Time: 8mins
  • Kador Length: 300cm
  • Kador Height: 235cm-250cm
  • Fabric: Sentinel E
  • Connection Width: 285cm
  • Pack Size: L69.0 x H30.0 x W38.0cm
  • Rail Weight: 6.9kg
Product Warranty: The Vango Sunlight Air ProShield has a limited warranty that can be extended when registered with Vango.
Product Availability: The Vango Sunlight Air ProShield is available on next-day delivery

Product Description:
Maypole Motorhome Cover

Premium 4-Ply Waterproof and Breathable Motorhome Cover

Protect your motorhome year-round with the Maypole Motorhome Cover, crafted from heavy-duty 4-ply non-woven polypropylene fabric. This cover is UV stable, highly water resistant, and breathable, offering superior protection against rain, snow, dust, tree sap, and more. The material resists moisture penetration while allowing natural evaporation to prevent mold and mildew build-up.

Key Features:

  • Highly water resistant material (up to 1000mm hydrostatic pressure head)
  • Breathable fabric prevents condensation and mold
  • Reflectors on the front and rear for enhanced visibility
  • Elasticated hem for a snug, tailored fit
  • Secure nylon straps and plastic buckles at the side, front, and rear
  • Zips on all 4 corners for easy fitting
  • Side zips for convenient door access
  • Non-abrasive material to prevent scratches
  • Double-stitched seams for added durability
  • Handy storage bag included

The Maypole Motorhome Cover is available in 6 sizes to suit a variety of motorhomes:

  • MP9421: Up to 5.7m
  • MP9422: 5.7m - 6m
  • MP9423: 6.0m - 6.5m
  • MP9424: 6.5m - 7m
  • MP9425: 7m - 7.5m
  • MP9426: 7.5m - 8m

Tip: If your motorhome has a cab hump, we recommend selecting a cover that is the next size up for the best fit.

Product Description:
Leisurewize Low Wattage Electric Oven 14L 

Home-cooked Meals, Anywhere.

The Leisurewize Low Wattage Electric Oven is a compact electric oven for those with limited kitchen space. Ideal for small kitchens, student living, staff rooms, and even caravans and campervans, this 14L electric oven offers convenience and functionality without taking up much room. Its small size makes it easy to store and transport, while its versatile cooking functions – grill, roast, and bake – allow you to create a variety of dishes.

The Leisurewize Low Wattage Electric Oven also includes a 60-minute timer featuring automatic shut-off and an audible alarm, preventing overcooking and ensuring safety. The adjustable thermostat allows for precise temperature control with a maximum of 240°C, ensuring your food is cooked to perfection, even with limited power sources and all Leisurewize Low Wattage Electric Oven come complete with a grill rack, baking tray, and tray handle for added convenience.

Leisurewize Low Wattage Electric Oven Features:

  • Three cooking functions: grill, roast, and bake.
  • Adjustable Thermostat
  • 60-Minute Timer with Auto-Shutoff
  • Stainless Steel Heating Elements
  • Includes Accessories: grill rack, baking tray, and tray handle

  • Includes grill rack, baking tray & tray handle

Vango Camping Groundbreaker Glow Peg Set

Heavy-Duty Camping Glow Pegs

The Vango Groundbreaker Glow Peg Set is an essential addition to your camping gear, designed to tackle the toughest ground conditions. Perfect for securing heavier tents and awnings, these rock pegs offer maximum strength and durability, ensuring your camping setup stays secure even in challenging terrains. Featuring glow-in-the-dark caps for enhanced visibility, a durable storage case for easy organisation, and a handy extractor tool, this camping set ensures a secure and effortless setup even on hard terrain.

Key Features:

  • Glow-in-the-Dark Caps: Reflective peg caps enhance visibility around the campsite, reducing the risk of trips or accidents in low-light conditions.
  • Peg Extractor: Easily remove even the most stubborn pegs with the included extractor tool, saving you time and effort.
  • Hard Ground Performance: Specially designed rock pegs make pitching on hard ground effortless, providing reliable anchoring.
  • Durable Storage Box: The sturdy case keeps your pegs organised and easy to transport, ensuring they’re always ready for your next adventure.

Product Description:
Vango Camping Storage Organisers

Folding Storage Solutions for Awnings and Tents

The Vango Organisers are the perfect storage solutions for keeping your camping, festival, or outdoor adventure gear neatly organised. Available in two convenient styles, these organisers help you store everything from clothes and shoes to food and camping equipment, ensuring your space remains clutter-free. Whether you're looking for a compact and lightweight organiser for your tent or a versatile folding option for your car and campsite, there's a Vango organiser to suit your needs. Choose from the Vango Storage Organiser or the Vango Folding Organiser, each designed to offer efficient, portable, and practical storage for your next outdoor trip.

Vango Storage Organiser - ACMSTORAGRLLW28:

Keep your camping space organised with the Storage Organiser, a compact and lightweight solution for all your storage needs. Perfect for storing shoes, clothes, books, or camping equipment, this versatile organiser ensures your tent or awning stays tidy during your outdoor adventures. Easy to pack down into a small size, it’s ideal for family camping trips, motorhome storage, and other camping essentials. Stay organised and make the most of your space with this practical, space-saving storage solution. Whether you're camping in a tent or caravan, this organiser is a must-have for every trip.

Vango Folding Organiser – ACMSTORAG0VFW28:

The Vango Folding Organiser is the perfect storage solution for your outdoor adventures. Whether placed in the back of your car, inside your tent, or in your awning, it keeps your space tidy and organised. Featuring multiple compartments, it provides ample space for storing boots, clothes, food, and more. Easy to move with handles at either end, this organiser folds down to a compact size for effortless transportation and storage at home. Ideal for camping gear organisation, car storage, and outdoor home solutions, it’s a must-have for any camping or caravanning trip.

Key Features:

  • Compact and lightweight for easy storage and transport
  • Ideal for storing camping gear, shoes, clothes, food, and more
  • Folds down for space-saving storage when not in use
  • Perfect for festivals, family camping trips, and outdoor holidays
  • Multiple compartments for organised storage and easy access
  • Space-efficient storage solutions for both car and campsite organisation

Product Name: Leisurewize 1.7L Caravan Campervan Air Fryer with Digital Display
Product Description:
Leisurewize 1.7L Motorhome Air Fryer

Air Fryer with Digital Display

The Leisurewize 1.7L Air Fryer offers a healthy and convenient way to enjoy your favorite fried foods. Utilizing rapid hot air circulation technology, this Air Fryer allows you to cook with little to no oil, resulting in meals with up to 75% less fat compared to traditional deep frying. Perfect for cooking frozen chips, red meats (beef, lamb, pork), poultry, vegetables, and pastries like spring rolls.

 

This versatile 1.7L Air Fryer features an intuitive digital display for easy control. You can set the cooking temperature between 80℃ and 200℃ and the timer for up to 60 minutes. With a 1.7L cooking capacity and a 1000W heating element made of durable SS304 stainless steel, the Leisurewize Motorhome Air Fryer operates on a standard 220-240V AC 50-60Hz input voltage, making healthy cooking simple and efficient.

 

Air Fryer Key Features:

  • Clear digital display
  • 1.7L capacity
  • 1000W heating element
  • Rapid hot air cycling technology
  • Up to 75% less fat than traditional deep frying methods
  • Digital timer
  • Easy to clean
  • Non-stick base

Leisurewize Skyliner 420 Air Caravan Awning

Caravan Inflatable Awning and Sun Canopy

The Leisurewize Skyliner 420 Air is a spacious and luxurious air awning. This impressive awning offers ample room for socializing, dining, and even extra sleeping space. The Leisurewize Skyliner 420 Air also features large windows and skylights on the roof panels to allow natural light to flow in, and sky screens on each door to keep insects out.

 

Constructed from high-quality 3000HH rated waterproof material with taped seams, the Skyliner provides reliable protection from the elements. High-visibility guy lines with adjustable triangular fixing points ensure secure and stable pitching. With additional functionality to roll back the walls and doors, allowing you to transform the awning into an airy sun canopy for those hot summer days.

 

Air Awning Key Features:

  • A spacious and luxurious air awning

  • Sky lights on each of the three roof panels
  • Made from 3000HH rated waterproof material with taped seams

Product Description:
Outdoor Revolution Electric Eco Heater

Compact Travel Fan Heater for Camping and Awnings

The Outdoor Revolution Electric Eco Heater is your ultimate travel companion for staying comfortable on your next camping trip. Whether you're looking to warm up a caravan awning, drive-away awning, or family tent, this compact travel fan heater delivers efficient heating in smaller spaces. Designed for portability, its lightweight and space-saving cylindrical design makes it easy to pack away in your travel bag. The Electric Eco Heater is versatile for year-round use, functioning as an oscillating cylindrical fan in summer with a 70° sweeping airflow to aid cooling and air circulation. Enjoy complete control with the modern digital control panel, which provides access to multiple variable heat settings. For peace of mind, the heater includes advanced safety features like an overheat protection system and a cut-out safety trip switch, ensuring safe operation at all times. This camping heater also includes a integrated timer function which allows you to set it and forget it, making it perfect for use overnight without compromising safety. Powered through a campsite mains connection, the Electric Eco Heater is a reliable addition to your camping gear.

OR Eco Heater Key Features:

  • Modern digital control panel for customizable comfort.
  • Compact cylindrical design for easy packing and storage.
  • Automatic overheat protection for added safety.
  • Dual functionality with warm/cold air output for year-round use.
  • Cut-out safety trip switch to prevent accidents.
  • Integrated timer function for carefree operation.
  • Made from Virgin PP flame-retardant materials for durability.
  • 70° oscillation fan for optimized air circulation.
  • Powered through a mains connection for reliable use.
  • Certified to meet UKCA and CE standards.

Heater Specifications:

  • Voltage: 220v-240v
  • Current: 600w-1200w
  • Weight: 1.35kg

Product Description:
Vango Beta 350XL 3 Man Family Tunnel Tent

Ideal for camping, festivals and weekend breaks.

The Vango Beta 350XL is a fantastic choice for couples camping or small groups. The queen-size bedrooms are spacious and feature darkened inner fabric, ensuring you get a restful sleep even on bright Summer mornings. They have useful storage pockets to keep your valuables safe at night, and the wide doors have no step-over meaning no danger or tripping, and allowing easy access for prams or wheelchairs. The spacious porch area features large diamond-clear windows to let in maximum natural light and provide clear views of your surroundings, the windows have roll-away curtains for privacy at night. The entrance doors have bug nets to keep pests out while increasing airflow, and the Vango AirZone incorporates high and low ventilation panels to reduce condensation. The groundsheet is waterproof and highly durable, it is also toggle-in so can be removed when not needed. This quick-pitch, spacious, 3-person tent has a separate living area with room enough to relax and shelter during adverse weather.

Crafted from Vango's Sentinel fabric, it is strong, durable and has a hydrostatic head rating of 4,000mm ensuring you stay dry during showers. The fabric also resists UV fading thanks to the ColourLok Eco technology. The fabric has fully taped seams and are fully wind and rain tested to EN ISO 5912 standards.

When the camping trip is over, the tent packs down into a small carry bag (L65cm x H22cm x W22cm) taking up minimal storage space.

Vango Beta 350XL Features:

  • Oversized corner pegs.
  • High visibility guy lines.
  • Integrated lantern hanging points.
  • Mesh bug nets on the living room doors.
  • Strong Vango PowerFlex fibreglass poles.
  • Fully taped seams provides a watertight seal.
  • TBSII tension band system ensures performance in adverse conditions.
  • SkyTrack II hanging system allows you to easily attach lighting and storage.
  • Darkened bedrooms reduce early morning light, with storage pockets.
  • Adjustable pegging system allows tent to be pitched perfectly on uneven surfaces.
  • ColourLok Eco technology increases colour retention and protection against UV light.
  • Diamond clear windows maximise light and visibility with roll-away curtains for privacy.
  • High and low level ventilation panels increases air circulation and reduce condensation.
  • Fully wind and rain tested to standard EN ISO 5912. 
  • Fire retardant fabrics meet European EN5912 safety standard.
  • Linked-in waterproof PE groundsheet to keep the weather and bugs out.
  • Sentinel Fabric is waterproof to a 4,000mm HH rating.

350XL 3 Man Tunnel Tent Specification

  • Pitching Time: 15 mins
  • Capacity: 3 Person Tent
  • Weight: 7.6kg
  • Length: 430cm
  • Height: 145cm
  • Width: 225cm
  • Pack Size: L65cm x H22cm x W22cm
  • Waterproof Rating: 4000mm HH
  • Fabric: Sentinel E
  • Carry Bag
Product Warranty: The Vango Beta 350XL comes with a 1 year warranty that can be extended by registering your product with Vango.
Product Availability: The Vango Beta 350XL is available on a next-day service

Product Name: Outdoor Revolution Camp Star Rock 'n' Roll King Self Inflating Mattress
Product Description:
Outdoor Revolution Camp Star Rock 'n' Roll King 10cm Self Inflating Mattress

The Outdoor Revolution Camp Star Rock’n’Roll King 100 self-inflating sleeping mat is designed for larger Rock’n’Roll beds in VW campervans, offering enhanced comfort with a wider fit and deeper base than the standard Rock’n’Roll mat. The mat has a cutout so it can easily fit into the van. Constructed from durable polyester fabric on both the top and base, it’s suitable for use in continental campervans. The 10cm deep flat foam core features horizontal drill holes for reduced weight and improved compressibility and the two one-way cyclone valves allow for rapid inflation and deflation. Carry bag included.

Camp Star Rock 'n' Roll King 100 Features

  • Soft touch finish
  • 10cm of foam depth for enhanced comfort
  • Self inflating
  • Includes carry bag
  • One way Cyclone valve

  • Top Fabric: 75D*150D fabric, embossed with PVC coating

Product Name: Leisurewize Portawash Twin Tub Portable Caravan Washing Machine
Product Description:
Leisurewize Portawash Twin Tub

Portable Caravan Washing Machine

The Leisurewize Portawash Twin Tub is a portable washing machine with two drums; one wash, one spin. The Portawash Twin Tub is a main operated washing machine which is great for caravanning, camping, and boating. Alternatively, this washing machine is also suitable for student accommodation and as a backup washing machine at home if your main washer breaks.

 

The Leisurewize Portawash washing machine is specifically designed for washing small and light garments. This portable washing machine features two wash settings; gentle and normal. Use the gentle setting for sports wears and the normal setting for washing polyester and cotton fabrics. The wash drum of the Twin Tub provides a washing power of up to 230W and a wash capacity of 3.0kg. The spin drum provides a spin capacity of 2.5kg and spinning power of 116W.

 

Please note this washing machine is a gravity drain washing machine. It is does NOT come with a pump. When using this washing machine, it needs to be used near drain so that the unit's draining pipe can disperse water.

 

Portawash Key Features:

  • Portable washing machine, with handle for easy transportation
  • Dual water setting, gentle and normal, for sportswear or cotton fabrics
  • Efficient washing with a drum power of 230W and a capacity of 3.0kg
  • Efficient drying in spin drum, with a power of 116W and a capacity of 2.5kg
  • Requires to be used near a drain for water dispersal through the drainage pipe (no built-in pump)
  • Maximum wash time of 15 minutes
  • Maximum spin time of 5 minutes
  • Ideal for home emergencies or washing small/light garments quickly

Product Name: Streetwize 12V Modified Sine Wave Inverter for Caravans
Product Description:
Streetwize Modified Sin Wave Inverter

12V Caravan and Motorhome Inverter

The Streetwize Modified Sine Wave Inverters are ideal for caravanners, campers, drivers and tradespeople who need access to a power supply in a remote area, on site, or when power supply access is restricted. This Modified Inverter safely converts your caravan or motorhomes 12V DC battery to a 230V AC power supply. This Sine Wave Inverter is available in three models of different wattage; 300W, 1500W, 2000W, and 3000W.

 

The Sine Wave Inverter is suitable for powering UK standard appliances that require up to 300W, 1500W, 2000W, and 3000W respectively. Ideally, these inverters are able to power laptops, mobile phones, LCD TVs, DVD players, cordless power tool chargers and more. These inverters come in an anodized aluminium case with a built-in cooling fan to protect against overheating.

 

Compatible with most 12V cars, 4x4s and motorcycles. These Inverters are also suitable for most caravans, campervans, motorhomes, vans, lorries, camping and boats. Supplied with a 12V DC plug connection cable for operating appliances that require up to 150W and battery connector cables for operating equipment of up to 300W, 1500W, 2000W, and 3000W. The inverter is powered through the vehicle's battery, and the product is supplied with battery connector cables to connect the inverter to the 12V battery. The inverter works with the vehicle's battery when the engine is turned either on or off.

 

Sine Wave Inverter Key Features:

  • Safely converts 12V DC to 230V AC power supply
  • Two 3-pin UK plug sockets
  • Single USB charge port
  • Anodized aluminium case with built-in cooling fan.
  • Multiple electrical protection features including low voltage, over voltage, overload, short circuit & overheating
  • Supplied with battery connector cables
  • Not suitable for operating medical equipment, fluorescent lights and printers

The Streetwize Modified Sine Wave Inverters are suitable for:

  • Powering laptops
  • Phone chargers
  • Tablets & games consoles
  • Lighting (non ballast)
  • Charging batteries in cordless power tools
  • Low wattage appliances with heat element such kettle or toaster
  • Water pump

The Streetwize Inverters are not suitable/not recommended for:

  • Solar installations
  • Medical equipment, such as CPAP machines with humidifiers
  • Power tools running on AC motor and variable speed controls
  • Some Newer TV’s – refer to manufacturer guide
  • Items with digital clocks and electric timers including washing machines and bread makers
  • Devices that use thyristors like laser printers and photocopiers
  • Fluorescent lights
  • Audio Equipment, satellite systems and video equipment
  • High power items which use an AC motor such as larger fridges, microwaves and compressors

Product Description:
Vango Savannah 600XL Tent Package

6 Person Quick-Pitch Family Poled Tent

Enjoy spacious and comfortable camping with the Vango Savannah 600xl, a versatile 6-person family tent designed for extended camping trips. Featuring a large living area, separate bedrooms, and a built-in porch, the Vango Savannah 600XL tent. offers comfortable accommodation for up to six people. With a simple set-up this tent which can be pitched in around 18 minutes making it ideal for family camping, festivals and weekend getaways.

Featuring an extended living area the Vango Savannah poled tent has plenty of space for your family to relax, dine and for gear storage. It has a waterproof, sewn-in groundsheet to keep out bugs and draughts, handy hanging lantern points and electric hook-up access points. The Vango Savannah tent range features large, diamond clear windows offer panoramic views and let in plenty of natural light and toggled curtains for privacy. Several well placed ventilation points help keep the tent fresh and airy while minimising the risk of condensation. 

The extended front porch can be fully enclosed making a versatile space for all weathers, whether it be a shaded spot for relaxing on sunny days, shelter from the rain or an enclosed space for storing your camping gear. The large front door can be unzipped to the midpoint, or fully across, giving a great variety of options to suit different conditions and uses. 

The Vango Savannah tent has three spacious king size double bedrooms which feature midnight fabric. This premium darkened material reduces light penetration for enhanced sleep quality. It's king size bedrooms fit 6 people comfortably.

Savannah poled tents feature Vango's Sentinel Dynamic Weave Fabric, an innovative blend of 70D and 100D threads which create a lightweight yet robust fabric that offers exceptional strength and durability in all weather conditions.

Pitch the Savannah 600 poled in approximately 18 minutes thanks to its intuitive poled design, making it ideal for family camping trips, festivals, and weekend getaways.

Savannah 600XL 6-Man Tent Package Features:

  • Diamond clear windows to maximise light
  • PowerFlex lightweight and durable fibreglass poles
  • Colour coded poles for easy set-up
  • Additional groundsheet protector to protect and extend the life of your tent
  • SkyTrack II hanging system to easily attach lighting and storage
  • ColourLok Eco fabric for colour retention and UV protection
  • Hanging lantern points
  • Electric-hook-up access point
  • Additional footprint to prevent damage to your groundsheet

Vango Savannah 600 Specification:

  • Pitching time: Approx. 18 mins
  • Waterproof rating: 4000 mm
  • Dimensions: L700 x H210 x W380 cm
  • Weight: 29.3 kg
  • Pack size: L80 x H40 x W40 cm

Avtex V249DS 24” Smart HD TV with DVD Player for Caravan and Motorhome

23.8” Full HD Smart TV

The Avtex V249DS is a 12v 23.8-inch Full HD Smart TV with DVD player designed for caravans and motorhomes. The body is sleek and modern with a frameless 1920x1080 resolution LED display. It includes built-in HD satellite (DVB-S/S2) and terrestrial (DVB-T/T2) tuners, along with integrated 2.4/5GHz WiFi, Ethernet, and Bluetooth connectivity. The V249DS supports Freeview Play for UK catch-up services (iPlayer, ITVX, All4, etc.) and access to streaming platforms like Netflix, Amazon Prime, Disney+, and YouTube via its Vidaa-powered Smart TV app (requires internet connection). Additional features include wireless casting from mobile devices, DVD and CD playback, AQT, a battery meter, pause/playback functionality, 3 HDMI ports, optical audio output, 2 USB ports and a headphone socket.

Product Description:
Streetwize Pure Sine Wave Inverter

12V Caravan and Motorhome Inverter

The Streetwize Pure Sine Wave Inverter safely converts your caravans 12V DC battery in a 240V AC power supply. Available in three models to cater to your specific needs, allowing you to use standard UK electrical appliances up to its relative continuous output including; 1000W, 2000W, and 3000W. The Streetwize Pure Sine Wave Inverter is suitable for caravans, campervans and tradespeople who need access to a power supply whether in a remote area or when there is restricted access to power.

 

These Pure Sine Wave Inverters are an upgrade to the Modified Sine Wave Inverters. The Pure Sine Wave Inverters are able to operate a wide range of appliances, including appliances with an AC motor such as laser printers and fluorescent lights, which cannot operate using the conventional Modified Sine Wave Inverters. Featuring multiple electrical protection features including over-voltage protection, overload protection, short-circuit protection and overheating protection. The inverter is powered through the vehicle’s battery, and the product is supplied with battery connector cables to connect the inverter to the 12V battery. The inverter works with the vehicle's battery when the engine is turned either on or off.

 

These Inverters are ideal for your campervan, caravan, motorhome, truck, lorry, HGV, van, or boat. Also suitable for your remote camping trips, this versatile power inverter is just what you need to take your motor camping adventures to the next level.

 

IMPORTANT – PLEASE READ: These Pure Sine Wave Inverters are primarily designed for operating a wide range of Class 2 appliances. Class 2 appliances are double insulated and do not require earth connections. Most computers, laptops, photocopiers, laser printers, cordless power tools, and plastic-cased appliances are identified as Class 2 appliances.

 

PLEASE NOTE: This product is not suitable for operating Class 1 appliances. Typical Class 1 appliances include toasters, kettles, washing machines and irons.

 

Pure Sine Wave Inverter Key Features:

  • Safely converts your 12V DC battery into a 230V power supply
  • Suitable for powering a wide range of Class II appliances
  • More reliable output compared to conventional Modified Sine Wave Inverter
  • Two UK 3-pin plugs with protective covers
  • USB charge port for powering smartphone or tablet
  • Includes over-voltage protection, overload protection, short-circuit protection and overheating protection

Product Name: Easy Camp Skarvan 5 Person Family Tent
Product Description:
Easy Camp Skarvan 5 Family Tent

5 Berth Poled Tunnel Tent

Enjoy family camping in comfort with the Easy Camp Skarvan 5 tent. This spacious tunnel tent has three zones; a generous living area, sleeping area for five and a rain-safe canopy. The main living area is perfect for relaxing on rainy days and is equipped with organiser pockets, lantern hanging hooks and a mains hook-up access point. With a height of 185cm it allows adults to stand up comfortably. The Skarvan 5-person tent also has large windows to the front and side with toggle back curtains for privacy. A front canopy gives shelter gives comfortable shelter or shade. The Skarvan 5 is the perfect tent for family camping adventures.

The Skarvan 5 sleeps five comfortably and features a removable dividing wall for privacy and organiser pockets to stow torches and mobile phones. The Sleep Tight inner bedroom tent has darkened walls and ceiling to reduce light in the early evening and morning to ensure a more restful sleep. Rear ventilation panels can be fully opened or covered up to adjust airflow.

The Easy Camp Skarvan tent has lots of ventilation to keep your family cool on hot days. A rear ventilation panel, full mesh door to the side and mesh panels to the front ensure good air circulation. The sewn in groundsheet keeps the tent draft and bug-free.

Easy Camp Skarvan 5 Features:

  • Family tunnel tent with great living area and front rain safe entrance
  • Excellent air circulation to reduce damp
  • Large side entrance with full mesh door
  • Sewn-in groundsheet to keep out draughts and insects
  • Sleep Tight darkened inner tent
  • Windows with toggle-up curtains
  • Mesh panel at each side of the front entrance
  • Standing height in living area
  • Divided bedrooms for privacy can be removed with toggles
  • Organiser pockets in the living area and in the inner tent
  • Mains access
  • Guyline retainers
  • Colour-coding on poles and pole sleeve

Easy Camp Skarvan Tent Specification:

  • Waterproof: Hydrostatic Head 3000 mm
  • Taping: Taped seams
  • Tent Poles: Endura Flex, fibreglass 12.7 mm
  • Flysheet: Weather Guard 3000, 190T polyester PU coated, PFC free water repellency, fire retardant
  • Pack Size: 73cm x 27cm
  • Weight: 16.2 kg

Product Description:
Vango Savannah Air 600XL Tent Package

Spacious 6 Person Family Tent and Footprint Bundle

The Savannah 600XL Air is the latest family tent from Vango. It is a spacious and versatile family tent, perfect for camping adventures. With a roomy living area and separate sleeping compartments, it offers comfortable accommodation for up to six people. This 6-person tent is extremely quick to pitch using Vango's unique inflatable AirBeam structure and the pump provided, meaning your tent will pitch in minutes, making it the ideal choice for family camping, festivals and extended getaways.

Featuring an extended living area the Vango Savannah Air tent has ample space for relaxing, dining and storage. It has a waterproof, sewn-in groundsheet to keep out bugs and draughts, handy hanging lantern points and electric hook-up access points. The Vango Savannah Air tent range features large, diamond clear windows to make the most of the views and let in plenty of natural light and toggled curtains for privacy. Several strategically placed ventilation points help keep the tent fresh and airy while reducing the risk of condensation. 

The extended front porch in the Vango Savannah can be fully enclosed making an additional versatile space for all weathers, whether it be a shaded spot for relaxing on sunny days, shelter on rainy days or an enclosed space for storing your camping gear. The large front door can be unzipped to the midpoint, or fully across, giving a variety of options to suit different uses. 

The Vango Savannah Air tent has three spacious king size double bedrooms which feature midnight fabric. This premium darkened fabric enhances sleep by reducing light in the evening and early morning for more relaxed camping. 

The Savannah Air Tents feature Vango’s innovative Sentinel Dynamic Weave fabric, blending 70D and 100D threads for enhanced strength and durability while remaining lightweight. This fabric offers dependable performance when camping in all weathers.

Savannah 600 Tent Package Features:

  • Diamond clear windows to maximise light
  • Colour coded poles for easy set-up
  • Additional groundsheet protector to protect and extend the life of your tent
  • SkyTrack II hanging system to easily attach lighting and storage
  • ColourLok Eco fabric for colour retention and UV protection
  • TBSII Tension Band System ensures the tent performs in strong winds
  • Hanging lantern points
  • Electric-hook-up access point
  • Additional footprint to prevent damage to your groundsheet

Vango Savannah Air Specification:

  • Pitching time: 18 mins
  • Waterproof rating: 4000 mm
  • Dimensions: L700 x H210 x W380 cm
  • Weight: 31.7 kg
  • Pack size: L80 x H50 x W50 cm

Product Name: Shurflo Trail King Campervan 12V Water Pump Kit with Fiamma Accumulator
Product Description:
Shurflo Trail King 12V Water Pump Kit with Fiamma Accumulator

30 PSI 6.8L/10.6L Water Pump Kit for Campervan

The Shurflo Trail King Water Pump Kits are useful for your water tank, sink, water heater, etc. The Shurflo Trail King Water Pump, along with the Fiamma Accumulator, ensures consistent water flow in your campervan, caravan or motorhome. Featuring John Guest fittings that screw directly onto your pump and accumulator, saving added fittings and leak risks. The other end of each fitting is compatible with 12mm John Guest water pipe - available separately. The Shurflo Trail King Water Pump is designed to be used with a fresh water tank to ensure quality waterflow. The recommended setup ensures efficient water flow from your tank, through the filter and pump, into the accumulator, and finally to your sink or water heater.

 

What's in the box?:

  • 1 x Shurflo Trail King 12V 6.8L or 10.6L 30PSI water pump
  • 1 x 2024 Black Fiamma A20 Accumulator
  • 1 x Shurflo filter (screw on filter 1/2" threaded inlet and wing nut)
  • 4 x John Guest Fittings 12mm to 1/2” BSP female thread
  • Shurflo instruction manual
  • Fiamma branded box, manual and additional fittings

Installation Process:

  1. Connect water pipe to a John Guest fitting, then to the Shurflo filter.
  2. Screw the filter directly onto the Shurflo water pump.
  3. Connect another John Guest fitting to the pump and more water pipe.
  4. Connect the pipe to another John Guest fitting, then directly to the Fiamma Accumulator (removing provided nuts).
  5. Connect the final John Guest fitting to the accumulator and more water pipe, leading to your sink or water heater.

12/24v Wheeled Thermoelectric Camping Cooler

The Vango E-Pinnacle 40 Litre Electric Cooler offers versatile cooling powered by either AC 230V mains or DC 12V in-car socket. This electric camping cool box cools up to 16°C below the ambient temperature, ensuring your food and drinks stay cool even in warm weather. Key features include built-in cable storage, polyurethane foam insulation, and comes with a UK plug and car adapter. The Vango E-Pinnacle cooler is well suited to camping, festivals or for travel. Product Name: ATOM Boost 12V Portable Power Bank Charging Station
Product Description:
ATOM ESS Boost 12V Portable Camping Power Bank

Portable Leisure Power Station

The ATOM ESS Boost 12V Portable Power Banks are a mobile battery option that keeps your devices running while off-grid or on the road. An easy choice for camping outdoors, or to be used in your motorhome, caravan or campervan. The Boost Power Station is available in three models to suit your portable power needs. The ATOM Boost range includes; ATOM600, ATOM1500 and ATOM2200, each with increasing AC output wattage and capabilities.

 

These portable power batteries are perfect for charging your mobile phone or tablet, powering your lamps and lighting, and even powering your kitchen appliances such as your kettle. These leisure power stations charge in as little as 1.6 hours, and can power up to 6, 7 or 14 devices simultaneously according to the model. Read the specification below to find the perfect mobile charging station for your next outdoor camping adventure.

 

A key feature of the ATOM Camping Power Banks is its management system. Including protection such as over voltage protection, overload protection, over temperature protection, short circuit protection, low temperature protection, low voltage protection, over current protection, Battery Management System and MPPT. These measurements provide a boosted battery performance and ensure safe operation under varying conditions.

 

Portable Power Bank Features:

  • Fast Charging
  • Small & Compact
  • Power Devices Simultaneously
  • USB-A, USB-C and UK Plug Socket Ports
  • Lightweight and Portable
  • Power on the Move
  • Wireless Charging (ATOM2200 only)

Product Name: ATOM Boost 3.6 Portable Power Storage Station
Product Description:
ATOM ESS Boost 3.6 Portable Campervan Power Storage Station

Modular Portable Camping Power System

The ATOM Modular Portable Campervan Power System is designed to be a home battery appliance, but with its portable features, this power system is ideal for camping, caravanning, campervanning and motorhome adventures. This battery system is stackable, allowing you to compile battery modules on top of each other, ultimately increasing the units power capabilities. For information regarding modular power capabilities, see the specification table below. The ATOM 3.6 Home Power System can act as a backup home power supply, allowing you to continue charging your devices and powering your systems in the even of power shortage. Additionally, store solar power in this power station to save on costs.

 

This is the perfect solution for portable power. This device not only supports PV solar panels, but is capable of supporting access to inverters and is compatible with AC coupling, making it perfect for on the road campervan adventures or use this battery storage station for your static caravan as a backup from your main power supply. This power storage system is a great portable power supply for in remote locations or for on the move.

 

Installation cannot be easier with the Boost 3.6 Portable Power System, in just 15 minutes you can have your ideal setup up and running. With the ATOM ESS mobile app, you can control, monitor and analyse your Boost 3.6 from anywhere, allowing you to stay in control of your power and bring down costs. Install the Boost 3.6 into your campervan or motorhome for remote charging on the move, a great upgrade to you caravan, campervan or motorhome.

Product Name: Victron Kit 15 - IP22 12v Campervan Mains Charger Kit
Product Description:
Victron Kit 15 - IP22 Mains Leisure Battery Charger Kit

Pre-Wired Solution for Campervans, Motorhomes, Boats & Off-Grid Power

The Victron IP22 Mains Leisure Battery Charger Kit is a fully pre-wired, plug-and-play charging and power distribution solution, ideal for campervans, caravans, motorhomes, boats, and off-grid setups. Designed for safe and efficient leisure battery charging, this kit includes high-quality cables, circuit protection, and connection points for a hassle-free installation.

Key Features:

  • Smart Charging: The Victron IP22 12V/30A Mains Charger ensures reliable, adaptive charging to extend leisure battery life.
  • Pre-Wired & Ready to Install: Supplied with pre-cut and terminated cables for quick and professional installation.
  • Built-In Safety & Protection: Includes a 60A midi fuse and holder to protect your system from overloads.
  • Premium Cables & Connections: Features 10mm² and 16mm² cables, copper lugs, and a 3-core mains cable for strong and efficient power transfer.

Product Description:
Victron Kit 16 - MultiPlus 1600/70 Inverter Charger Kit

Reliable Power for Campervans, Motorhomes, Boats & Off-Grid Systems

The Victron MultiPlus 1600/70 Inverter Charger Kit is a pre-wired, high-performance power solution designed for campervans, motorhomes, caravans, boats, and off-grid setups. Featuring the Victron MultiPlus 1600VA 12V 70A Inverter Charger, this kit ensures seamless power conversion, battery charging, and system protection in a compact and efficient package.

Key Features:

  • Powerful Inverter & Charger Combo: The Victron MultiPlus 1600VA delivers pure sine wave AC power, while the 70A charger efficiently manages battery charging.
  • Pre-Wired & Ready to Install: Supplied with high-quality cables, lugs, and connectors for a quick and easy installation.
  • Advanced System Protection: Includes a 200A mega fuse and holder, along with a 275A Victron battery switch isolator to safeguard your electrical setup.
  • Reliable Power Distribution: Features two 25A mains consumer units for safe and regulated AC power management.
  • Optional Mains Inlet: Available in white, grey, or black, the FAWO mains inlet with a magnetic closure provides a clean and professional finish.

What’s Included?

  • Victron MultiPlus 1600VA 12V 70A Inverter Charger
  • Pre-wired 50mm² DC cables & copper lugs for high-current handling
  • 3-core mains cable (2500mm) for AC connections
  • 200A mega fuse & holder for circuit protection
  • Victron 275A battery switch isolator
  • Two 25A mains consumer units for AC power management
  • Optional FAWO Mains Inlet (White/Grey/Black)

Perfect for

This kit is ideal for campervans, motorhomes, caravans, boats, and off-grid power systems, ensuring efficient, reliable, and fully protected power conversion and battery charging.

With pre-wired components for easy installation, this kit provides a professional, safe, and dependable off-grid power solution for your leisure battery system.

NRF Cassette Flyscreen and Blind for Caravans and Motorhomes
Product Description:
NRF Flyscreen and Blind for Campervans, Caravans, and Motorhomes

Thermal Blind & Fly Screen for Campervans – Insect Protection, Privacy & Insulation

The NRF Flyscreen and Blind is a must-have accessory for any campervan, caravan, or motorhome owner. This versatile product combines the convenience of a mesh fly screen to keep insects at bay with a thermal blind that helps insulate your space, offering comfort and privacy at all times. Perfect for windows and doors, the NRF Flyscreen and Blind lets you enjoy fresh air without worrying about pests and provides much-needed temperature control, ensuring your living space remains cozy no matter the weather outside. With its easy installation and variety of available sizes, it's designed to suit all kinds of motorhomes, caravans, and campervans.

Key Features:

  • Dual-Layer Design: Combines a mesh fly screen and a thermal blind to keep insects out and provide privacy and insulation.
  • Easy Installation: Quick and simple to install, making it suitable for DIY projects.
  • Flexible Operation: Both the fly screen and blind can be adjusted to your preference, offering customizable light control.
  • Durable Materials: Built with high-quality materials for long-lasting performance.
  • Multiple Sizes: Available in various sizes to suit a range of window dimensions.

Technical Specifications:

These blinds come as x 650 (true height 736mm) height as standard, however, they can be cut down to suit.

 

To work out which width blinds you require, the inside width of the blind cassette (A) must be equal to or greater than the width of the rubber seal on your window frame (B). Once you have this dimension, determine the correct size blind from the chart below:

Blind Dimension (A) Length Height

600 x 650 mm 640 mm 676 mm 650 mm

100w/200w Portable Caravan Solar Panel

The ATOM Solar Panels are perfect for caravans, motorhomes and campervans. These portable solar panels are available in 100w and 200w power options for suit your charging needs. Purchase these long solar panels for complete freedom to recharge your power station remotely. The ATOM TYN Solar Panel is made from durable ETFE material, is scratch and stain resistance, and can perform in all weather conditions, all you need is sunlight. Angle towards the sun for the best solar energy charging.

 

The best solar panels in the UK! Suitable for your camper roof, outdoor leisure activities and your camping adventures. These solar panels are foldable and have a handheld design, takes up little space when on the road travelling. Really portable and easy to setup, works best on van roof, simply unfold, and charge your outdoor electronic motor home devices. Simply connect directly into your power station, such as the ATOM Boost 12V Portable Camping Power Bank Campervan Charging Station and get the best out of your ATOM products. Ensure you stay connected in the most remote locations and efficiently power all of your devices off the grid!

Contents include: 1x TYN 100w/200w Solar Panel, 1x XT-60 Connection Cable.

  • Suitable for all weather conditions, just needs sunlight!

Product Name: Outdoor Revolution Camp Star 500XL 5 Person Poled Family Tent
Product Description:
Outdoor Revolution Camp Star 500XL 5 Person Poled Family Tent

A spacious five-berth tent ideal for holidays and weekend trips.

The Outdoor Revolution Camp Star 500XL Tent is a spacious 5 person family tent designed for freedom and flexibility when camping. The tent has a spacious 5 person bedroom that is luxuriously large for a couple, but can be divided into two sleeping areas using a toggle-in divider. The darkened 'Twilight' fabric ensures the whole family gets a good night's rest, even on bright Summer mornings. A generous living area is complemented by a full front porch that can be enclosed for extra space or rolled back for open-air dining. Ventilation is maximised by a bedroom ventilation system and Phoenix mesh fly screen panels, while large crystal-clear windows provide natural light with toggle-up internal curtains for privacy. The Camp Star 500XL includes colour-coded teal guylines with quick adjusters, an adjustable pegging system, a peg set, footprint and a carry bag. Constructed with lightweight 120HDE HEX high-density all-weather fabric and Dura-tech fibreglass poles, it offers a 3000mm hydrostatic head

Camp Star 500XL DT Features

  • Fibreglass poles.
  • Adjustable pegging system.
  • Zipped side door with mesh bug screen.
  • Colour coded guy lines with quick adjusters.
  • Darkened 5-person bedroom with optional divider.
  • Under-window ventilation with external covers.
  • 120HDE HEX high density all weather lightweight fabric.
  • Large clear windows with roll-away, toggle-up privacy curtains.
  • Internal divider panel with zip-back door and mesh window with curtain.
  • Includes tent, footprint, peg set & carry bag.

Outdoor Revolution Poled Family Tent Specification

  • Total Weight: 23.8kg
  • Pack Size: 72cm x 33cm
  • Footprint: 600cm x 330cm
  • Hydrostatic Head: 3000mm
Product Warranty: The Outdoor Revolution Camp Star 500XL has a 1 year warranty.
Product Availability: The Outdoor Revolution Camp Star 500XL is available on a next-day courier.

Product Name: Outdoor Revolution Carpet for Camp Star 500 / 500XL Tents
Product Description:
Outdoor Revolution Carpet for Camp Star 500 / 500XL Tents

Add a Touch of Luxury with a Made to Measure Carpet

Experience camping with an added luxurious twist thanks to the lightweight and super-soft awning carpet. Designed to fit the Camp Star 500 / 500XL family tents, the carpet is an essential optional addition that helps create a more comfortable and snug environment. Featuring a super-soft upper texture underfoot and damp-proof protection underneath, this carpet is specifically designed to compliment the colours of the Camp Star range of tents.

Durable and Tough

The carpet serves as a practical solution to adding additional comfort and warmth underfoot, as well as safeguarding the groundsheet of your tent from potential damage caused by furniture, dog claws, and accidental spills. The carpet also makes cleaning up easier and can reduce dirt, mud or stones being walked in to your motorhome or campervan. 

Insulative Properties

Featuring a resilient, hardwearing backing with insulation properties, it not only shields against cold and damp, but also provides a warm and soft area within your living space of your tent. Versatile and robust, this carpet comes neatly packed in a convenient carry bag, allowing for compact storage and effortless portability.

Camp Star 500 / 500XL Carpet Features

  • Suitable for both indoor & outdoor use
  • Protects footprint from damage
  • Prevents water ingress
  • Includes carry bag

Outdoor Revolution Carpet Specification

  • Size: 310cm x 175cm
Product Warranty: The Outdoor Revolution Carpet has a 1 year warranty

Manufactured by Fiamma, it ensures high-quality construction, making it a strong, durable, and easy-to-install option for your campervan setup.

Compatibility:

Product Name: Adventurer Premium Glass Top Hung Campervan Motorhome Windows
Product Description:
Adventurer Premium Campervan Motorhome Horse box Windows

Black Aluminium Flat Frame Low Profile Campervan Window

Adventurer Premium Campervan Top Hung Windows are designed for a sleek, modern finish on your van conversion. Built with a durable aluminium frame and high-quality, tinted double-glazed panels (Outer layer tempered glass and the inner layer acrylic), they provide excellent UV resistance, privacy, and long-lasting performance.

Practical and Stylish

These windows feature a strong aluminium frame and are available in a range of sizes to suit different vehicle layouts. The Adventurer glass windows prioritise stability and durability, incorporating an aluminium frame and stainless steel strut rods. These features ensure a strong, reliable structure for your campervan adventures.

Privacy is Key

With a tinted double-glazed window and an integrated blind and flyscreen within a PVC frame, the Adventurer Premium Window provides privacy while helping to control light levels inside your vehicle. The built-in flyscreen allows for airflow while keeping insects out.

Easy Installation

A sturdy mounting frame supports a wall thickness of 25-40mm, ensuring easy installation on most campervans and motorhomes. For added structural rigidity, it is recommended that a timber frame is bonded to the inside of the vehicle.

Adventurer Premium Top Hung Hinged Glass Windows Specifications

  • Aluminium alloy flat frame finished in black
  • Double-glazed window
  • UV resistant
  • Double stainless steel struts
  • Two handle closures
  • Blind and flyscreen with PVC frame
  • Wall thickness mounting size: 25-40mm frame
  • Suitable for caravans, motorhomes, van conversions, and campervans

6 Circuit 12V Blade Fuse Block with Cover and Indicator Lights
Product Description:
6-Way Blade Fuse Block with Cover and Indicator Lights

Reliable and Safe Fuse Protection for 12V-24V Electrical Systems

The 6-Way Blade Fuse Block with Cover and Indicator Lights is a high-quality fuse distribution solution designed for campervans, caravans, motorhomes, boats, and other 12V-24V electrical systems. With a 100A input capacity and 30A max per circuit, this fuse block ensures efficient power distribution while providing dustproof protection.

 

Fuse Block Key Features:

  • Protective Cover: The clip-lock protective cover shields fuses from dust and debris while offering insulation, heat resistance, and flame-retardant protection.
  • Stable Performance: The nickel-plated brass terminals provide low resistance and excellent conductivity, ensuring a stable and reliable power supply.
  • LED Visual Feedback: Each circuit features an LED indicator that illuminates when a fuse is blown, allowing for quick and easy identification of faults.
  • Sturdy Construction: Built with high-quality materials, ensuring long-lasting mechanical strength and durability.
  • Enhanced Safety: The PBT flame-retardant plastic base protects electrical components and enhances overall safety.

Ideal for Multiple Applications:

Perfect for use in campervans, caravans, motorhomes, boats, and other 12V-24V DC systems, the 6-Way Blade Fuse Block ensures safe and efficient power distribution with superior protection and durability.

Product Name: 6-Way Fuse Block with Negative Bus and Cover
Product Description:
6-Way Fuse Block with Negative Bus and Cover

Reliable Power Distribution for 10V-32V DC Electrical Systems

The 6-Way Fuse Block with Negative Bus and Cover is designed for automobiles, campervans, caravans, motorhomes, boats, and other 10V-32V DC systems. With a maximum of 20A per circuit and 75A per panel, this fuse block ensures safe and organized power distribution while simplifying wiring connections.

 

Fuse Block Key Features:

  • Dual Positive & Negative Bus: Features 6 dedicated fuses and 6 grounding positions, with each positive terminal having a corresponding negative terminal for clear circuit organization.
  • Protective Cover: The clip-lock cover shields fuses from dust and debris while offering insulation, heat resistance, and flame-retardant protection.
  • Terminals: M6 bolt for the main wire and M4 stud for single wire connections, ensuring secure and reliable contact.
  • Capacity: Supports 100A per block and 30A per circuit, with a maximum voltage of 32V DC.
  • Fuse Compatibility: Designed for ATO/ATC fuses ranging from 1A to 20A.
  • Sturdy Construction: Made from high-quality materials, ensuring durability and long-term reliability.

Ideal for Multiple Applications:

Product Description:
5-Pin M8 Stud Terminal Busbar 150A

High-Performance Power Distribution for 12V-48V DC Systems

The 5-Pin M8 Stud Terminal Busbar is a heavy-duty power distribution block designed for automotive, marine, campervan, caravan, motorhome, and off-grid applications. Rated for 150A DC continuous current at 12V-48V DC, this high-capacity busbar ensures reliable and efficient power distribution in demanding environments.

 

Stud Terminal Key Features:

  • High Current Capacity: Supports up to 150A DC continuous current and 130A AC with a maximum voltage of 48V DC / 300V AC, making it suitable for a wide range of electrical systems.
  • Durable Construction: Built with stainless steel M8 (5/16") terminal studs and copper plates, ensuring superior conductivity and corrosion resistance.
  • Positive & Negative Busbar Design: Features 5 terminal studs for both positive and negative connections, making it ideal for battery and power distribution in campervans, caravans, motorhomes and boats.
  • Round Corner Base: Unique nylon and fiberglass base with smooth, rounded edges for a modern and professional appearance.
  • Open Area Design Cover: The protective cover allows 180° wire lug installation, accommodating various terminal configurations and installation methods.

Ideal for Multiple Applications:

Perfect for campervans, caravans, motorhomes, boats, automotive, and off-grid power systems, the 5-Pin M8 Stud Terminal Busbar ensures secure, efficient, and high-capacity power distribution with durable construction and flexible installation options.

Product Name: 4 in 1 Charger Outlet 12V Socket Panel with Toggle Switch
Product Description:
4-in-1 Switched Control Panel with Built In Voltage Monitor, Duel USB and Toggle Switch

Versatile 12V-24V Power Panel for Vehicles, Boats, and Off-Grid Systems

The 4-in-1 Charger Outlet Socket Panel is a multi-functional 12V power solution designed for campervans, caravans, motorhomes, boats, and other vehicles. Combining a dual USB charger, digital voltmeter, cigarette lighter socket, and LED rocker switch, this panel meets multiple power needs in one compact unit. This 4 frame outlet panel is ideal for campervans, motorhomes, caravans, marine, and other off-grid leisure vehicles, available in UK.

 

Outlet Panel Key Features:

  • 4-in-1 Power Panel: Includes a 12V USB outlet, LED digital voltmeter, 12V cigarette lighter outlet, and an LED rocker toggle switch for convenient power distribution.
  • Dual USB Charger Socket: Features two USB ports with a total output of 4.2A (5V/2.1A & 2.1A), intelligently detecting devices for optimal charging speed.
  • Real-Time LED Voltmeter: Displays voltage from 6V to 28V DC, allowing easy monitoring of your vehicle, boat, or off-grid battery system.
  • LED ON/OFF Rocker Switch: Designed for 10,000+ cycles, this 12V/20A switch provides easy control while integrating a 12V cigarette lighter socket for additional device compatibility.
  • Overcharge Protection: Built-in over-current, over-voltage, and overheat protection ensures safe and efficient charging for all connected devices.
  • Interchangeable & Detachable: The modular design allows easy panel customization, letting you swap out components to suit your specific needs.

Ideal for Multiple Applications:

Perfect for campervans, caravans, motorhomes, boats, cars, trucks, and off-grid power systems, the 4-in-1 Charger Outlet Socket Panel offers a compact, customizable, and highly functional power solution for all your charging and monitoring needs.

Product Name: Multi-Function 5-Gang Rocker Switch Panel for Campervans & Motorhomes
Product Description:
Multi-Function 5-Gang Rocker Switch Panel with Dual USB, Voltmeter, 12V Outlet & Circuit Breakers

Versatile Power Control & Charging for 12V-24V Vehicles

The 5-Gang Rocker Switch Panel is a multi-functional control and charging solution, designed for campervans, caravans, motorhomes, boats, trucks, trailers, and off-grid applications. Featuring five LED rocker switches, dual USB ports, a 12V outlet, an LED voltmeter, and built-in circuit breakers, this panel provides seamless control over electrical accessories while ensuring efficient power management.

 

Key Features:

  • 5 Independent Rocker Switches: Blue LED ON/OFF switches provide easy control over lights, fans, pumps, and other 12V-24V accessories.
  • Dual USB Charging Ports: Two USB ports (5V 2.4A each) enable fast device charging for smartphones, tablets, and GPS devices.
  • 12V Digital Voltmeter: Displays real-time voltage (5V-48V), allowing users to monitor battery and electrical system health.
  • 12V Cigarette Lighter Socket: Provides additional DC power output for external devices and accessories.
  • Built-In Circuit Breakers: Includes 15A fuses and overload protection, safeguarding connected devices from electrical surges and damage.
  • Waterproof & Durable Design: IP68 water-resistant switches and IP65 waterproof housing ensure performance in harsh conditions.
  • Effortless Installation & Customization: Pre-wired for easy plug-and-play installation. Comes with mounting screws and DIY decals for labeling switches based on usage.

Ideal for Multiple Applications:

Perfect for campervans, caravans, motorhomes, boats, UTVs, ATVs, trucks, trailers, RVs, and off-grid power systems, this 5-Gang Rocker Switch Panel provides efficient power management, durable construction, and user-friendly operation, making it an essential upgrade for any 12V-24V vehicle electrical system.

Product Description:
MIDI-Mega Distribution Fuse Box

High-Power Distribution for Campervan, Caravan, Motorhome and Marine Electrical Systems

The MEGA-MIDI Fuse Distribution Box is a compact and efficient power distribution solution, designed to handle high-current electrical systems in campervans, caravans, motorhomes, boats, and off-grid applications. This unit allows a single MEGA fuse to distribute power to up to four MIDI fuses, making it ideal for battery charging systems, large amplifier setups, and marine applications.

 

Key Features:

  • Efficient Power Distribution: Supports one MEGA fuse feeding power to four MIDI fuses, creating a compact, high-power distribution unit.
  • Heavy-Duty Terminals:
    • 2 x M8 studs for main power connections.
    • 4 x M5 studs for distributing power to multiple circuits.
  • Durable Construction: The housing is made from black, 30% glass-filled nylon 66, providing excellent strength, durability, and heat resistance.
  • Compact & Space-Saving Design: With a footprint of 116mm (L) x 94mm (W) x 38.9mm (H), it efficiently integrates into campervan, caravan, motorhome and marine electrical systems.
  • High Current Capacity: Supports a maximum total load of 300A, ensuring reliability for high-power applications.

Ideal for Multiple Applications:

The MEGA-MIDI Fuse Distribution Box is perfect for use in campervans, caravans, motorhomes, boats, large battery charging systems, and high-power amplifier setups. Its compact yet powerful design ensures efficient and safe power distribution in demanding electrical environments.

Note: Fuses are not included with the product.

Product Description:
Vango Sierra 300 Poled Tent

The Ideal 3-Person Tent for Summer Breaks

The Vango Sierra 300 is a three-person tunnel tent designed to focus on ventilation, helping to keep condensation and moisture to a minimum. Multiple mesh panels, including one behind the bedrooms, maximise airflow and keep the tent cool. The King-size bedroom sleeps 3 and is made from darkened fabric to give a better night's sleep, especially during brighter Summer mornings, additionally, keep your valuables safe with the storage pockets inside the bedroom. The cable entry point with tidies allow you to connect to mains directly from the bedroom. Vango's Diamond Clear windows allow for plenty of natural light to fill the living area, while the sewn-in groundsheet keeps draughts and bugs out. The front canopy acts as a rain shelter and also extends the living and porch space. A large front door with mesh panels can be partially or fully rolled back to accommodate any configuration. The living area and bedroom has a drop down door which allows for easy access to wheelchairs or prams. When night falls, toggle up the curtains for privacy. Integrated lantern hanging points and Vango's SkyTrack II system allow you to customise your interior to your needs. 

Vango Sierra 300 Features

  • Lightweight Sentinel fabric.
  • Diamond clear windows.
  • Lantern hanging points.
  • High visibility guylines.
  • Adjustable rear ventilation.
  • Waterproof PE groundsheet.
  • Cable entry point with tidies.
  • Large mesh roll-away front door.
  • Vango PowerFlex fibreglass poles.
  • Bug nets on both living room doors.
  • Front canopy extends the generous living space.
  • Darked King size bedrooms with storage pockets.
  • Bedrooms have wide doors and no step-over for easy access.
  • Front door has a pram and wheelchair-friendly drop down step.
  • SkyTrack II system allows you to easily attach lighting or storage.
  • Fully Taped Seams, wind and rain tested and fire retardant fabrics.
  • Fully sewn-in groundsheet provides a bug and draught-free environment.
  • ColourLok Eco technology increases colour retention and protection against UV light.
  • Upright side walls allows you to fully maximise the internal head space.
  • Carry bag included.

Sierra 300 Camping Tent Specification

  • Pitching Time: 15mins
  • Capacity: 3 Person Tent
  • Weight: 14.7kg
  • Length: 460cm
  • Height: 195cm
  • Width: 235cm
  • Pack Size: L75cm x H27cm x W27cm
  • Waterproof Rating: 4000mm HH
  • Fabric: Sentinel Fabric
Product Warranty: The Vango Sierra 300 has a 2 year warranty, register your product with Vango for an extra year of cover.
Product Availability: The Vango Sierra 300 is available on a next-day courier service.

Product Description:
Outwell Roadtrip Double Sleeping Bag

Warm and cosy double sleeping bag for camping adventures

Enjoy a cosy and comfortable night’s sleep with the Outwell Roadtrip Double Sleeping Bag. Designed for two people, this high-quality sleeping bag provides warmth, convenience, and plenty of space, perfect for couples or solo campers who prefer extra room. Whether you're heading to the campsite, festival, or caravan holiday, this sleeping bag ensures a restful night in all conditions.

 Key Features:

  • Generous Size: Measuring 225 cm x 150 cm, offering plenty of room for two campers.
  • Warm & Insulated: Two-layer offset construction with Isofill hollow fibre insulation keeps you warm down to -1°C.

Product Description:
Vango Inflatable Chair & Inflatable Sofa

Pack Light, Sit Right

The Vango Inflatable Chair & Vango Inflatable Sofa are the perfect seating solutions for any outdoor excursion.

Their rapid inflation is thanks to the convenient free-flowing valve, allowing you to quickly set up a comfortable spot wherever you are. The armchair design, coupled with a double-layer height, provides excellent back and leg support, making them much more comfortable than standard inflatable seating.  The soft, flocked PVC surface adds a touch of luxury, while the internal coil beam construction ensures stability and prevents sagging. 

Beyond comfort, the Vango Inflatable Chair & Vango Inflatable Sofa are designed for practicality. The ground-sheet friendly base protects your tent floor from damage, and the elevated height makes getting in and out of the chair and sofa significantly easier.  With a robust 120kg (18st 12lbs) weight capacity, they're suitable for most users.  Included repair patches provide peace of mind in case of punctures and when you're ready to pack up, the Vango inflatable chair and Vango inflatable sofa deflates to a compact size, making it incredibly easy to transport and store.

Inflatable Chair and Sofa Features:

  •     Flocked PVC - Extra soft, comfortable flocked surface
  •     Coil Beam Construction - Offers great support whilst being extremely comfortable
  •     Groundsheet Friendly - The smooth surface area ensures there is no damage to your groundsheet
  •     Elevated Height - Easier to stand up from
  •     Maximum Loading Weight - 120kg/18st 12lbs (Chair), 250kg/39st 5.16lbs (Sofa)
  •     Repair Patches Included - For use in emergencies

The Vango Rock and Roll 12cm Campervan Mattress offers the ultimate comfort for campervan beds. Created from 75 Denier, soft, brushed fabric and 3D construction to create a larger surface area, you can enjoy a comfortable night's sleep in your pop-top wherever you park for the night. Quickly inflate and deflate with the cyclone valve and when you need to pack the mattress away, it includes a carry bag and straps. 

Rock and Roll SIM 12cm Features

  • Comfortable and warm-to-touch fabric covers the mat to give you a comfortable sleep
  • 3D construction with vertical walls creates a larger surface area to enhance your sleeping experience
  • Cyclone valve allows for fast and easy inflation and deflation
  • Includes carry bag

Product Name: Campervan and Motorhome Tambour Shower Door
Product Description:
Campervan and Motorhome Tambour Shower Door

Maximize bathroom space with the Tambourline sliding shower door

Transform your caravan or motorhome shower with the Tambourline sliding door – the easy-install solution for a stylish and space-saving bathroom. Available in two colours, glossy Piano Black or Silver. Tambour doors, also known as roller shutters, are a fantastic alternative to traditional doors, especially in the tight spaces of campervans and motorhomes.

This kit provides all the components (screws not included) for a premium tambour door that glides effortlessly, creating a compact and functional shower enclosure. The kit includes 2m of tambour slats, a handle profile, a magnetic catch, and pre-bent tracks for easy installation.

Tambour Shower Door Features:

  • Space-Saving Design: Ideal for maximizing space in caravans, motorhomes, and van conversions.
  • Lightweight Construction: Made from durable, lightweight plastic.
  • Adjustable Size: Height and width can be easily adjusted by removing/trimming slats.
  • Easy Installation: Simple, DIY-friendly installation process.
  • Complete Kit: Includes all necessary components (except screws) for installation

Tambour Shower/Bathroom Door Includes:

  • 2m of flexible tambour slats
  • Matching handle profile
  • Self-adhesive magnetic catch
  • Pre-bent tracks
Technical Specifications:
  • Dimensions: 2000 H x 600 W mm
  • Weight: 8Kg
Product Warranty: The Tambour Bathroom/Shower door comes with a 1 Year Manufacturer Warranty.

Product Description:
Outwell Tostado Camp Bed

The Outwell Tostado Camp Bed is a fantastic choice for campers seeking a comfortable and hassle-free sleep experience. Its clever folding design allows for quick and easy setup, unfolding in seconds with no complicated assembly required. The sturdy, high-strength steel frame ensures stability and can support a maximum load of 125kg, making it suitable for most campers.

The Outwell Tostado fold away camping bed keeps you off the cold, damp ground, providing insulation and a much more comfortable sleeping surface. It also creates a handy storage space underneath for your gear, keeping it organized and off the ground (elevated height of 21cm). Outwell’s Tostado is designed to work perfectly with a self-inflating mat (sold separately) while the elasticated corner straps keep the mat securely in place.

Outwell Tostado Camp Bed Key Features:

  • Folding design: Folds flat for easy transport and storage.
  • Easy setup: Locking legs and elasticated corner straps for quick assembly.
  • Elevated height: 21cm tall for comfortable sleeping and under-bed storage.
  • Durable construction: High-strength steel frame and 100% polyester fabric.
  • Carry bag included: For convenient storage and transport.

Outwell Camp Bed Specification:

  • Compact pack size: 48 x 64 x 15cm when folded.
  • Maximum load: 125kg.
  • Lightweight: 6.6kg
  • Size: 63 x 193 x 22 cm (WxLxH)

Product Description:
12V Motorhome 200A/300A Master Battery Switch

On/Off Disconnection Switches

The On/Off Master Battery Disconnection Switches are rated at 200A and 300A continuous current and 350A and 450A intermittent current in a 12V-32V DC. The Master Switches ensure safe and efficient operation of your electrical system, with a choice of 200A or 300A, you can match the specific requirements of the switch to meet the needs of your motorhomes electrical system.

 

The easy to use On/Off Battery Disconnect Switch is designed for easy operation. With enhanced safety and battery protection, these switches are the best choice for you outdoor leisure vehicle. This switch completely disconnects your vans battery when not in use, preventing battery drain and eliminating potential electrical hazards.

 

Key Features:

  • Rugged and Durable Construction
  • Enhanced Safety and Battery Protection
  • Simple and Effective Operation
  • Versatile Applications
  • Maintains Battery Life

Ideal for Multiple Applications:

The 200A/300A Battery Disconnect Switch is designed for a wide voltage range of 12V-32V DC, this makes these switches ideal for various campervan, caravan, motorhome, marine, boat, car and RV applications.

Motorhome Battery Disconnection Switch

The Battery Disconnection Switch with Key and Cover is an ideal appliance for your motorhome, campervan or caravan. With a simple key rotary operation, you can fully disconnect your campervans battery with ease, preventing your battery from draining and increasing battery health. An additional feature of this Battery Switch is its removable key, for extra security and safety.

 

Key Features:

  • Durable Build: Made from heavy duty materials and features copper terminals with stainless steel hex nuts for conductivity
  • Enhanced Battery Safety: Prevents battery from draining over time when not in use. Completely disconnects your battery

  • Anti-theft: Removable key for additional layer of security. Take the key out with you and easily disconnect the battery from power

The Battery Switch with Key and Cover for Motorhomes is perfect for a variety of vehicles and equipment including motorhomes, camper vans, caravans, cars, boats, ships, trailers, trucks, RVs and ATVs. Enabling your more power control over your battery for peace of mind.

Product Name: Inline Campervan Blade Fuse Holder 12V AWG Wire
Product Description:
Inline Blade Fuse Holder 12V AWG Wire

Middle Fuse Holder to Accept Standard Blade Fuses

This in line fuse holder features a snap-fit lid and a 30A current rating. The Inline Blade Fuse Holder is suitable for use with standard blade fuses. Suitable for ATC/ATO size fuses, featuring durable rubber caps and a heavy duty cord. Installation could not be easier, simply cut the wire in the middle to separate the loop, connect one end to the power supply and one end to your device. The loop wire enables you to decide the length of the two sides, based on your own needs.

 

This Blade Holder is made from hardwearing PVC which protects the circuit from splashing water and dust, increasing its lifetime. Comes with 30A and 40A fuses.

 

Key Features:

  • High Quality Wire: Wire features good bending properties, fusion resistance, excellent electrical conductivity
  • Slash Proof Casing: To protect from moisture and dust
  • Water Resistant Cover: Designed features sealing to prevent water and dust from entering the components
  • Easy installation: Just cut this loop and connect one end to the power supply and the other end to the power cord of your electrical appliance
  • Customizable Installation: The loop wire enables you to decide the length of the two sides, based on your own needs, cut in the middle for an even split

Ideal for Multiple Applications:

This Inline Blade Fuse Holder is suitable for any 12V – 24V vehicles including motorhome, campervan, motorcycle, boat, truck, ATV, RV, marine. Fuse holders can be used in a variety of way, whether the requirement is electrical protection, isolation or resistive loads, the Inline Blade Fuse Holder is the right tool for you.

Product Name: Campervan Auto 12V Fuse Holder for Standard Blade Fuse
Product Description:
Campervan Auto Fuse Holder for Standard Blade Fuse

Mini Piggyback Add-a-Circuit Blade Fuse Holder

The 12V Auto Fuse Holder for easy and safe addition of circuits. Protects both existing and new wiring. Simple vise-grip installation. No need to splice wires, adding electronic accessories and power sources is simple with the Auto Fuse Holder. This power holder turns 1 slot into 2 and allows individual protection to each circuit.

 

Perfect for setting up a dashcam in your motorhome! Use this Fuse Holder for setting up a new circuit while retaining the original one. Ideal for setting up a D+ connection in DC-to-DC charger systems and comes supplied with a 5A blade fuse.

 

Key Features:

  • Add-a-Circuit Functionality: Easily piggyback in an existing fuse slot! Use this circuit expansion to set up a new circuit while keeping the original one.
  • Dual Protection: One fuse holder to protect existing circuits and another fuse holder to protect new circuits. Connect quickly using the flexible blue tails and a vise.
  • Easy to Use: Forget cutting wires! Easily add an additional power source or connect to the fuse block.
  • High Quality: Made from high quality materials. Excellent conductivity and durability.

Ideal for Multiple Applications:

The Auto Fuse Holder is ideal for a variety of applications, including LED strips, radar detectors, even to install your dash cam straight into your cars fuse box. Suitable for a range of outdoor leisure vehicles including motorhomes, campervans, caravans, RV, marine, boat, vans and cars.

Product Name: Victron Energy Orion 12/24 10A DC-DC Motorhome Converter IP20
Product Description:
Victron Orion 12/24 10A DC-DC Campervan Converter IP20

Campervan Battery Charger

The Victron Orion 12/24V DC-DC Converter is an ideal solution for converting and regulating DC voltage for your campervan. Victron DC-DC converters are use to manage and stabilise the voltage in your caravan, campervan, motorhome, and boat. Also suitable for marine and off-grid vehicles. Featuring a remote on-off connector that eliminates the need for a high current switch in the input wiring. This can be operated with a low power switch or using the engine run/stop switch. See attached manual for more information. The easy to install Victron IP20 Converter comes includes with four Insulated Fastons Female Crimp 6.3mm for seamless installation.

 

With an adjustable output, this campervan DC-DC converter can also be used as a battery charger. For instance, the Orion IP20 DC-DC Converter can be used to changer a 12V starter or accessory. The Victron Orion features adjustable output that can be paralleled to increase output current with up to 5 units that be be connected in parallel. Easy to install into campervan, motorhome, boat and caravan power systems, ideal for outdoor holidays and leisure.

 

Key Features:

  • Remote On Off Connector
  • Adjustable Output to be used as a convert and battery charger for dual functionality
  • Output is Scalable, can be paralleled to increase output current
  • Easy to Install
  • Precise Voltage Regulation
  • Engine Run/Stop Integration
  • Four Insulated Faston Female Crimp 6.3mm connectors included

The Victron MultiPlus 12/2000/80-32 230V Inverter Charger Kit is a pre-wired, high-efficiency power solution designed for campervans, motorhomes, boats, and off-grid power setups.   • Advanced Circuit Protection: Comes with a 300A mega fuse, fuse holder, and a 275A Victron battery switch isolator to safeguard your system.
  • Reliable AC Power Distribution: Features two 25A mains consumer units for safe and efficient AC power management.
  • High-Performance Design: Engineered to handle high-demand power applications, making it ideal for off-grid and mobile energy solutions.

  • Pre-wired 70mm² DC cables (red and black) with copper lugs
