Option Set: Victron Kit Solar and Battery Option
Product Description:
Victron Kit 19 - DC-DC and MPPT Solar Charging Kit for Campervan, Caravan & Motorhome

Complete Off-Grid Power Solution for Campervans and Motorhomes and On the Move and In the Sun

The Victron DC-DC and MPPT Solar Charging Campervan Kit is a pre-configured, high-performance power system designed to provide efficient battery charging and solar power management for campervans, motorhomes, and off-grid setups. This kit includes a Victron Orion-Tr DC-DC charger, SmartSolar MPPT charge controller, 185W solar panels, and all necessary wiring and components for a seamless, reliable installation.

Key Features

  • Dual Charging System: Includes the Victron Orion-Tr 12/12 30A DC-DC charger for efficient alternator charging and the Victron SmartSolar MPPT 100/30 charge controller for optimal solar power management.
  • High-Efficiency Solar Panels: Comes with two 185W Victron mono solar panels, providing reliable off-grid energy generation.
  • Pre-Wired for Easy Installation: Includes dedicated wiring packs, fuse holders, and MC4 connectors to simplify the setup.
  • Advanced Circuit Protection: Features a 4-way MIDI fuse holder, a 125A mega fuse, and additional 40A and 60A MIDI fuses for full system safety.
  • Customizable Mounting Options: Choose between black or white solar panel mounting supports, corner fixings, cable glands, and Sikaflex adhesive for a secure and professional installation.
  • Battery Compatibility: Available with or without a battery, with options for a 12V 110Ah AGM deep cycle battery or a 12V 100Ah Victron SuperPack lithium battery for higher efficiency and longevity.

What’s Included

  • Victron Orion-Tr 12/12 30A DC-DC Battery Charger
  • Victron SmartSolar MPPT 100V/30A Charge Controller
  • Two Victron 185W Mono Solar Panels
  • Victron Solar Splitter Pair (MC4)
  • MC4 Solar Cables (5m, 6SQ) – 2 pieces
  • Negative Bus Bar M8
  • 4-Way MIDI Fuse Holder & Single MEGA Fuse Holder
  • 125A MEGA Fuse, 40A & 60A MIDI Fuses
  • Choice of Black or White Solar Panel Mounting Supports, Corner Fixings, and Cable Glands
  • Sikaflex 221 Adhesive (Black or White)
  • Optional AGM or Lithium Battery

Perfect for

Ideal for campervans, motorhomes, and off-grid power systems, this kit provides a versatile, efficient, and self-sufficient energy solution, ensuring your leisure battery stays charged via solar and DC-DC charging.

With all necessary components pre-selected, this kit delivers a hassle-free installation, making it an excellent choice for anyone looking to upgrade their off-grid power setup with Victron’s reliable technology.

Dellcool 30 Litre Minibar Silent Mini Fridge Blue/Red
Product Description:
Dellcool 30 Litre Minibar Silent Absorption Hotel Mini Fridge

Compact Quiet Absorption Student Refrigerator

The Dellcool 30L Minibar Absorption Fridge is a compact and efficient cooling solution designed specifically for hotels, minibars, and bed and breakfasts.  Its standout features include "Brisk Walk" technology, which delivers 30%+ energy savings compared to standard models by minimizing temperature fluctuations, crucial for reducing operating costs. The integrated "Electronic Dog" sensor continuously monitors for ammonia leaks, providing a critical safety feature in guest accommodations.

The Dellcool 30L Minibar Hotel Silent Absorption Fridge is also built to handle warmer climates, maintaining consistent cooling performance even at ambient temperatures up to 32℃. Designed for versatile installation, it's compatible with standard 110V/220V mains power and DC12V/24V, ensuring easy integration into any hotel or B&B setting. The Dellcool 30L Minibar Absorption Hotel Fridge offers a unique combination of energy efficiency, safety, durability, and convenience, making it the perfect amenity for enhancing guest experiences.

Ideal for use in hotels, and bed and breakfasts due to its silent functionalities. Also suitable for student accommodation flats and student houses. Compact refrigerator for smaller homes, making this silent absorption fridge great for students, hotels and B&Bs.

Dellcool 30L Minibar Absorption Hotel Fridge Features:

  • "Brisk Walk" technology for 30%+ energy savings
  • Integrated "Electronic Dog" ammonia leak sensor
  • Cool in Warm Climates: Maintains performance up to 32℃
  • Stylish Design: Glossy finish door, customizable color options
  • Quiet Operation: Super silent performance
  • Low Maintenance: Auto defrost feature
  • Reversible door
  • 110V/220V and DC12V/24V compatible
  • Colours; Blue or Red

Technical Specifications:

  • Model: ADM30-B (Blue) / ADM30-R (Red)
  • Capacity: 29 Liters
  • Input Power: 65 W (DC12V/24V)
  • Temperature: 0-10 ℃

Product Name: Dometic CFX2 28 AC/DC Portable Compressor Cool Box
Product Description:
Dometic CFX2 28 AC/DC 12v Compressor Cool Box

Portable Camping Fridge Freezer

The Dometic CFX2 28L portable compressor cool box offers exceptional cooling and freezing performance in a compact design. This premium, heavy duty fridge/freezer has a 28l capacity allowing you to enjoy cold food and drinks anywhere. Designed to endure, its rugged design and robust build features reinforced corners, stainless steel hinges, and a strong, removable lid, making it ideal for demanding outdoor use. 

With a high performance compressor and variable motor speed, the Dometic CFX2 cooler delivers seamless temperature control between +20°C and -22°C, offering exceptional flexibility for your cooling needs. The Dometic CFX2 compressor camping fridge freezer features a user-friendly app, digital display and optimized power consumption making this small powered cooler perfect for camping, road trips and extended outdoor adventures. Battery protection prevents excessive vehicle discharge, ensuring peace of mind on extended trips. The Dometic CFX2 28 portable compressor cool box is adaptable to both mobile and home use, with the flexibility to connect to 12/24v DC for vehicles or 100–240v AC, ensuring reliable cooling wherever you are. 

Dometic CFX2 Compressor Cooler Features:

  • Compressor cooler - VMSO3 Cooling Technology
  • Easy to use interface - 4-Digit LED with soft touch buttons and dim light setting
  • Removable lid - Aluminium hinges & hardware. Reversible. Non-slip logo pad
  • Rugged construction - Reinforced Corner Protection
  • Folding handles - Ergonomic foldable carry handles
  • Internal LED light - For interior illumination
  • USB charging - Charge small electronics
  • Battery Protection - Prevents excessive vehicle battery discharge
  • Connectivity - Control and monitor temperature via the Dometic Mobile Cooling App
  • Organised storage - Removable wire basket for efficient storage
  • Smooth Click Shut - Easy One-Hand operation
  • Easy to clean - drain plug for quick and easy cleaning

Dometic CFX2 Mobile Fridge Specifications:

  • Power Source - AC 100-240V DC 12V/24V
  • Temperature Range - -4°F to 68°F (-22°C to 20°C)
  • Capacity - 28L (42 x 330ml cans)
  • Dimensions - Height 427 mm x Width 600 mm x Depth 345 mm
  • Weight - 13.3kg
  • Colour - Ocean
  • Box contents - 1 cooler, 1 manual, 1 cable for DC12/24V connection, 1 cable for AC100-240V connection, removable wire baskets

Product Name: Victron Kit 20 - DC-DC and IP22 Mains Campervan Charger Kit
Product Description:
Victron Kit 20 - DC-DC and IP22 Mains Campervan Charger Kit

Reliable Dual Charging Solution for Campervans, Motorhomes & Off-Grid Systems

The Victron DC-DC and IP22 Mains Campervan Charger Kit is a versatile power solution designed to efficiently charge your leisure battery from both mains power and vehicle alternator. This kit is ideal for campervans, motorhomes, and off-grid applications, featuring both the Victron Orion-Tr 12/12 30A DC-DC charger for on-the-move charging and the Victron IP22 12V/30A mains charger for shore power connection.

Key Features

  • Dual Charging Capability: Charges your leisure battery via mains power (Victron IP22) or alternator (Victron Orion-Tr 12/12 30A DC-DC charger) for a reliable and efficient system.
  • Pre-Wired for Easy Installation: Supplied with high-quality wiring packs, fuse holders, and bus bars to simplify setup.
  • Comprehensive Circuit Protection: Includes a 4-way MIDI fuse holder, 125A mega fuse, and additional 40A & 60A MIDI fuses for system safety.
  • Integrated AC Power Distribution: Comes with two 25A mains consumer units, a 3-pin switched socket, and a surface-mounted back box for seamless mains power integration.
  • Optional Mains Inlet: Choose from white, grey, or black FAWO mains inlets with a magnetic closure for a clean and professional installation.
  • Battery Compatibility: Available with or without a battery, offering the option of a 12V 110Ah AGM deep cycle battery or a 12V 100Ah Victron SuperPack lithium battery for enhanced efficiency and performance.

What’s Included

  • Victron Orion-Tr 12/12 30A DC-DC Battery Charger
  • Victron IP22 12V/30A Mains Battery Charger
  • 3-pin switched socket & surface-mounted back box
  • Two 25A mains consumer units
  • Negative Bus Bar M8
  • 4-Way MIDI Fuse & Single MEGA Fuse Holder
  • 125A MEGA Fuse, 40A & 60A MIDI Fuses
  • Optional FAWO Mains Inlet (White/Grey/Black)
  • Optional AGM or Lithium Battery

Perfect for

Ideal for campervans, motorhomes, and off-grid setups, providing a versatile and efficient power system that ensures your leisure battery stays charged whether you're on the road or plugged into mains power.

This pre-wired charger kit ensures a hassle-free installation, professional-grade safety, and long-term reliability, making it the perfect power management solution for off-grid travel.

Optional Battery Selections

Battery Options AGM Battery Victron Lithium Battery Fogstar Lithium Battery
Optional Battery Selection 1 x Victron 12V 110Ah AGM Deep Cycle Battery 1 x Victron 12V 100Ah SuperPack Lithium Battery 1 x Fogstar 105Ah 12V Lithium Battery

Product Description:
Dellcool Minibar Silent Absorption Fridge

Student Minibar Silent Absorption Fridge

The Dellcool Student Minibar Fridge is a compact, minibar refrigerator specifically designed for use in hotels, bed and breakfasts, and similar hospitality settings. It provides efficient storage for beverages and snacks, offering a temperature range of 0-10 degrees Celsius, powered by a 65-watt input.

A key feature is the "Brisk Walk" technology, which optimizes cooling cycles to achieve over 20% energy savings compared to standard models, making it an economical choice for businesses.  Crucially, the Dellcool Minibar Hotel Fridge operates with super silent technology, ensuring a peaceful and undisturbed environment for guests.

This unit is also designed to operate effectively in ambient temperatures up to 32 degrees Celsius, ensuring consistent performance in varying room conditions. The Dellcool Minibar Hotel Fridge includes practical features such as auto-defrost, adjustable shelving, and an infrared light switch for convenient access.

This compact Silent Minibar Absorption Fridge is designed for small rooms with little space, making it the perfect fit fit for hotel rooms, bed and breakfast rooms, and even ideal for student flats and houses. This Minibar Absorption Fridge is small and compact, along with its silent features, which makes this fridge suitable for your bedroom.

Dellcool Minibar Fridge Features:

  • 20%+ Energy Saving (Brisk Walk Tech): Reduced temperature fluctuations for efficiency
  • 32℃ Ambient Adaptability: Reliable cooling in warmer environments
  • Super Silent Operation: Minimal noise disruption
  • Auto Defrost: Low maintenance, efficient cooling
  • Infrared Light Switch: Auto-illumination
  • Adjustable Shelving
  • Ammonia Leakage Control: Enhanced safety
  • Adjustable Shelves: Flexible organization

Product Name: Victron Kit 21 - DC-DC MPPT IP22 Complete Campervan Charging Kit
Option Set: Victron kit - Solar Mounts, Battery, Shunt
Product Description:
Victron Kit 21 - DC-DC, MPPT, and IP22 Complete Campervan Charging Kit

All-in-One Power Solution for Campervans, Motorhomes & Off-Grid Setups With Choice of Batteries and Shunt

The Victron DC-DC, MPPT, and IP22 Complete Campervan Charging Kit is a comprehensive power management system designed to maximize charging efficiency from solar, mains power, and vehicle alternator. This kit is ideal for campervans, motorhomes, and off-grid energy setups, featuring Victron’s DC-DC charger, MPPT solar controller, and IP22 mains charger, along with high-performance solar panels and pre-wired components for a seamless installation.

Key Features

  • Triple Charging System Includes:
    • Victron Orion-Tr 12/12 30A DC-DC charger for alternator charging.
    • Victron SmartSolar MPPT 100/30 charge controller for efficient solar power management.
    • Victron IP22 12V/30A mains charger for shore power charging.
  • High-Efficiency Solar Power: Comes with two 185W Victron mono solar panels, providing dependable off-grid energy generation.
  • Pre-Wired for Easy Installation: Includes dedicated wiring packs, fuse holders, and MC4 connectors for a straightforward setup.
  • Advanced Circuit Protection: Features a 4-way MIDI fuse holder, 175A mega fuse, and additional 40A & 60A MIDI fuses to protect the system from overcurrent.
  • Integrated AC Power Distribution: Equipped with two 25A mains consumer units, a 3-pin switched socket, and a surface-mounted back box for easy mains power access.
  • Customizable Mounting Options: Choose between black or white solar panel mounts, corner fixings, cable glands, and Sikaflex adhesive for a secure and professional installation.
  • Optional Battery Monitoring: Available with or without a Victron BMV-712 Smart Battery Monitor with Shunt for real-time battery performance tracking.
  • Battery Compatibility: Choose without a battery, or upgrade to a 12V 110Ah AGM deep cycle battery or a 12V 100Ah Victron SuperPack lithium battery for improved efficiency.

What’s Included

  • Victron Orion-Tr 12/12 30A DC-DC Charger
  • Victron SmartSolar MPPT 100V/30A Charge Controller
  • Victron IP22 12V/30A Mains Charger
  • Two Victron 185W Mono Solar Panels
  • Victron Solar Splitter Pair (MC4)
  • MC4 Solar Cables (5m, 6SQ) – 2 pieces
  • 3-pin switched socket & surface-mounted back box
  • Two 25A mains consumer units
  • Negative Bus Bar M8
  • 4-Way MIDI Fuse & Single MEGA Fuse Holder
  • 175A MEGA Fuse, 40A & 60A MIDI Fuses
  • Optional Battery Monitor with Shunt
  • Optional AGM or Lithium Battery
  • Mains Inlet not inlcuded - with a wide range to choose from there is plenty to choose from if you do not already an electrical inlet on board.

Perfect for

This kit is perfect for campervans, motorhomes, boats, and off-grid power systems, providing a versatile and efficient energy solution that ensures your leisure battery stays charged from multiple power sources. With pre-wired components, high-efficiency charging, and Victron’s trusted technology, this kit is an easy-to-install, professional-grade solution for anyone seeking a reliable and self-sufficient off-grid power setup.

Optional Battery Selections

Battery Options AGM Battery Victron Lithium Battery Fogstar Lithium Battery
Optional Battery Selection 1 x Victron 12V 110Ah AGM Deep Cycle Battery 1 x Victron 12V 100Ah SuperPack Lithium Battery 1 x Fogstar 105Ah 12V Lithium Battery

SunnCamp Ultima Pro Air 390 Sun Canopy
Product Description:
SunnCamp Ultima Pro Air 390 Sun Canopy

The SunnCamp Ultima Pro Air 390 is a premium inflatable sun canopy awning engineered with SunnCamp's Air Volution Technology, ensuring rapid and effortless inflation. The awning has large roll-up front panels which can be turned into a canopy with canopy poles (not included). The right-hand side panel is removable to reveal a bug mesh, perfect for enjoying fresh air while keeping insects at bay. The right panel can also be removed entirely to swap to an annexe if a bedroom is required. The left-hand side features an airflow doorway, further enhancing ventilation. All windows are equipped with curtains for privacy, and an external peggable mud wall provides added weather protection. The package is complete with a carry/storage bag.

The awning comes fully equipped with four air storm bars for enhanced stability, a draught skirt to minimise drafts, and storm buckles and reflective webbing straps for secure anchoring. Also included is a pump with gauge and dump valve.

The SunnCamp Ultima Pro Air 390 has a dual beading system with 7.2mm and 4.2mm beading, allowing seamless compatibility with both caravan awning rails and motorhome wind-out awnings.

SunnCamp Ultima Pro Air 390 Features

  • 300D PRO-TEK fabric
  • Dual beading 7.2mm/4.2mm
  • Roll up front panels
  • Removable side (right) panel with secondary mesh and veranda option
  • Left airflow side doorway
  • Curtains on all windows
  • External peggable mud wall for extra weather protection
  • Includes air storm bars (x4)
  • Draught skirt included
  • Includes storm buckles and reflective webbing straps
  • Includes pump with gauge with dump valve
  • Heavy duty zips
  • Come with carry/storage bag and pegs

Ultima Pro Air 390 Canopy Specification

  • Height Range: 235cm - 265cm
  • Approx Weight: 22.5kg
  • Floor Dimensions: W390cm x D240cm
Product Warranty: The SunnCamp Ultima Pro Air 390 has a 1 year warranty
Product Availability: # The SunnCamp Ultima Pro Air 390 is available on a 2-3 day service

Product Name: Victron Kit 25 - Multiplus 1600/70 Inverter plus MPPT DC-DC Charge and Lynx Distribution Campervan Charger Kit
Option Set: Victron Kit Solar and Battery Option
Product Description:
Victron Kit 25 - DC-DC, MPPT, MultiPlus 1600, Lynx, and Shunt Charging Kit

Complete Power Management Solution for Campervans, Motorhomes & Off-Grid Systems

The Victron DC-DC, MPPT, MultiPlus 1600, Lynx, and Shunt Charging Kit is a comprehensive off-grid power solution, designed to efficiently charge and manage multiple power sources in campervans, motorhomes, boats, and off-grid systems. Featuring solar, mains, and DC-DC charging, along with a Victron MultiPlus 1600 inverter/charger, Lynx power distribution, and a smart shunt battery monitor, this kit ensures seamless energy management and advanced protection.

Key Features

  • Triple Charging System:
    • Victron Orion-Tr 12/12 30A DC-DC charger for alternator charging.
    • Victron SmartSolar MPPT 100/30 charge controller for efficient solar power conversion.
    • Victron MultiPlus 1600VA 12V/70A inverter/charger for shore power charging and AC power output.
  • High-Efficiency Solar Power: Includes two 185W Victron mono solar panels with MC4 cables and connectors for easy setup.
  • Advanced Power Distribution: The Victron Lynx Distributor ensures safe and organized DC power distribution, reducing installation complexity.
  • Real-Time Battery Monitoring: The Victron BMV-712 Smart Battery Monitor with Shunt allows for precise monitoring of battery performance via Bluetooth.
  • Pre-Wired for Easy Installation: Includes dedicated wiring packs, fuses, and bus bars for a professional and hassle-free installation.
  • Complete Circuit Protection: Comes with 40A, 60A, and 200A mega fuses, ensuring full system safety and efficiency.
  • Customizable Mounting Options: Choose between black or white solar panel mounts, corner fixings, cable glands, and Sikaflex adhesive for a clean and professional installation.
  • Battery Compatibility – Available without a battery, or upgrade to:
    • Two 12V 110Ah AGM deep cycle batteries with battery link cable.
    • Two 12V 100Ah Victron SuperPack lithium batteries for higher efficiency and longer lifespan.
    • One 12V 230Ah Lithium Battery

What’s Included

  • Victron Orion-Tr 12/12 30A DC-DC Charger
  • Victron SmartSolar MPPT 100V/30A Charge Controller
  • Two Victron 185W Mono Solar Panels (1485mm x 668mm x 30mm)
  • Victron MultiPlus 1600VA 12V/70A Inverter Charger
  • Victron Lynx Distributor
  • Victron BMV-712 Smart Battery Monitor with Shunt
  • MC4 Solar Splitter Pair & Cables (5m, 6SQ – 2 pieces)
  • Two 25A mains consumer units
  • 275A Victron Battery Switch Isolator
  • 40A, 60A, and 200A Mega Fuses
  • Optional FAWO Mains Inlet (White/Grey/Black)
  • Optional AGM or Lithium Battery with Battery Link Cable

Perfect for

This kit is ideal for campervans, motorhomes, boats, and off-grid setups, offering a versatile and efficient energy solution that ensures your leisure battery stays charged from multiple power sources. With pre-wired components, high-efficiency charging, and Victron’s advanced technology, this kit is an easy-to-install, professional-grade solution for anyone seeking a reliable, self-sufficient off-grid power system.

Optional Battery Selections

Battery Options AGM Batteries Victron Lithium Batteries Fogstar Lithium Battery
Optional Battery Selection 2 x Victron 12V 110Ah AGM Deep Cycle Battery 2 x Victron 12V 200Ah SuperPack Lithium Battery 1 x Fogstar 230Ah 12V Lithium Battery

Reich Kitchen Tap Keramik Samba 39mm

The Reich Keramik Samba folding mixer tap is made from high-quality plastic materials, as well as a ceramic cartridge, it is a lightweight tap - ideal for campervans, caravans, motorhomes and boats - without sacrificing the style of household taps. This tap also comes with a microswitch rated to 4A to provide effective control of temperature and flow.

Fitting this mixer tap requires an installation hole of 39mm and is capable of a maximum water pressure of 6 bar.

  • Single lever
  • Barbed or John Guest tails

The Truma Ultrastore BGF 10 is a compact, lightweight and efficient water heater with a Flexible Flue. The Truma Ultrastore boiler is continuously reheated whilst water is drawn.

 

Overall, the Truma Ultrastore BGF 10 is a great choice for caravans, campervans, motorhomes and marine boats that need a reliable and efficient water heater. It is compact, lightweight, easy to use, and has a long lifespan.

Product Name: Dometic CFX5 25 Portable Electric Cool Box
Product Description:
Dometic CFX5 25 Portable Electric Cool Box

High-Performance Cooling for Outdoor Adventurers

The Dometic CFX5 25 is the ultimate portable electric cool box, engineered for high-performance cooling and freezing. Whether you're off-grid camping, on a road trip, or enjoying outdoor activities, the CFX5 25 ensures your food and drinks stay perfectly chilled, with no mess or hassle of ice. Featuring cutting-edge energy-efficient compressor technology, this cool box offers both cooling and freezing capabilities, allowing you to store everything from drinks to frozen meals. Capable of chilling items to -22°C, the CFX5 25 maintains optimal temperature control while being eco-friendly and power-efficient.

Designed for durability, the CFX5 25 is built to withstand the harshest outdoor environments, ensuring reliable performance wherever your adventures take you. Its robust construction offers excellent impact resistance, making it perfect for activities like off-roading, camping, and beach trips. With smart app control, you can easily monitor and adjust the cooler's settings remotely via Bluetooth or Wi-Fi, providing ultimate convenience while you're on the move. Whether you're keeping items chilled or frozen, the Dometic CFX5 25 delivers outstanding portability and performance, making it the ideal companion for your outdoor adventures.

Dometic CFX5 25 Cool Box Features:

  • 25L Capacity – Holds up to 33 cans
  • Powerful Cooling & Freezing – Adjustable temperature from +10°C to -22°C.
  • Energy Efficient – Low power consumption; compatible with 12/24V DC and 100-240V AC.
  • Smart App Control – Adjust settings remotely via Bluetooth or Wi-Fi.
  • Durable & Portable – Reinforced corners and handles for easy transport.
  • USB Charging Port – Includes USB-C for charging devices.
  • Quiet Operation – Operating noise reduced to 41 dB for a quieter experience.

  • Temperature Range: +10°C to -22°C
  • Power: 12/24V DC & 100-240V AC

  • Weight: 13.8 kg

What’s Included?

Product Description:
Dometic CVC1700G Caravan & Campervan Hob and Sink Combination Unit

Dometic Vision Combination Unit

The Dometic Vision Combination Unit CVC1700G is a high-quality kitchen appliance designed for compact spaces in motorhomes, caravans, and campervans. Available in both left-hand and right-hand sink configurations, this combination unit features a two-burner gas hob with a sink positioned to suit your layout, offering a practical and space-efficient cooking solution. The burners provide 1.1 kW and 2.0 kW of power, allowing for versatile cooking options. Its heat-resistant safety glass lid provides additional workspace when closed, making it ideal for compact mobile kitchens. The modern design allows it to fit seamlessly into a variety of interiors while keeping the kitchen space functional and tidy.

Key Features

  • Two-Burner Gas Hob & Left-Hand Sink – Ideal for small kitchen spaces, offering convenience and efficiency.
  • Safety Glass Lids – Heat-resistant lids provide additional workspace when closed and protect the unit when not in use.
  • Gas Shut-Off Feature – Ensures safety by immediately cutting off gas flow.
  • Soft-Close Hinges – Prevents abrupt lid closures, reducing wear and enhancing safety.
  • Ergonomic Controls – Allows for precise cooking control and easy operation.
  • Pre-Drilled Tap Hole (33mm) – Allows for easy tap installation (tap sold separately).
  • Includes Sink Waste & Rubber Seal – Sink waste requires a 19mm hose for drainage.
  • Flush Worktop Integration – Seamlessly blends with modern interiors for a stylish and professional finish.
  • Compliant with EN30-1-1:2021 Standards – Ensuring high safety and quality standards.

Westfield Orion 2.0 300 Drive Away Campervan Air Awning
Product Description:
Westfield Orion 2.0 300 Performance Drive Away Campervan Air Awning

Premium Drive Away Campervan Air Awning

The Westfield Orion 2.0 300 Performance Drive Away Air Awning is the perfect addition to any campervan or motorhome, offering both convenience and comfort. Designed for all seasons, this high-quality awning is built to withstand any weather with durable HydroTech CottonTouch fabric and a 10,000mm waterproof rating. It features a unique Advanced Air System (AAS) for quick, easy setup and can be inflated by a single person. The Orion 2.0 fits vehicles with heights between 180 cm and 270 cm, and there are three vehicle connectors available to choose from, ensuring the perfect fit for your campervan or motorhome. The awning can also be used as a freestanding tent, giving you the versatility to adapt to your camping needs. Whether you’re seeking extra living space or enjoying panoramic views through its large windows, the Orion 2.0 provides both versatility and protection, making it a great choice for your next adventure.

Part of the Westfield Premium Series, this awning features three-layer air tubes and a unique AAS System, with which the air awning is inflated at a single point, allowing a quick and easy setup. Utilising Hydrotech CottonTouch fabric with its anti-condensation performance, amazing weather resistance and UV stability, no other awning could compete. With user-friendly features, premium materials and advanced technology there is no other awning like this on the market.

Key Features

  • HydroTech CottonTouch fabric: Durable and weather-resistant, built to withstand all conditions
  • Advanced Air System (AAS): Quick, easy, and efficient inflation for a single-person setup
  • Freestanding Option: Can be used independently as a tent
  • Vehicle Connectors: Three connectors available for the perfect fit for your campervan or motorhome
  • Panoramic Windows: Large windows for beautiful outdoor views and natural light
  • Zippered Internal Blinds: Provides privacy when needed
  • Optional Annex: For extra storage or additional sleeping space
  • UV 50+ Protection: Keep cool and protected from the sun’s harmful rays
  • Removable Side Panels: For added convenience and flexibility
  • Ventilation Side Windows: Built-in ventilation for improved airflow
  • Storm Poles Included: For added stability in adverse weather conditions
  • Rain Safe Canopy: Protects against the elements while you relax outside

Product Description:
Victron Kit 9 – 115W Solar Panel and 100V/20A MPPT Charging Kit

The Victron Kit 9 comes with 115W Solar Panel and 100V/20A MPPT Charging Kit is a compact, efficient solar power solution, ideal for campervans, motorhomes, boats, and off-grid applications. This kit includes a high-quality 115W Victron mono solar panel paired with the Victron SmartSolar MPPT 100/20 charge controller, ensuring maximum solar energy conversion and reliable battery charging.

Key Features

  • Efficient Solar Power Generation: The 115W Victron mono solar panel provides dependable energy for off-grid charging.

The Victron Kit 23 – DC-DC and MPPT with 115W Solar Panel Campervan Charger Kit is a versatile off-grid power solution, designed to charge your leisure battery efficiently from both the vehicle alternator and solar power. This kit is ideal for campervans, motorhomes, and off-grid applications, ensuring reliable power generation and battery charging in remote locations.

Key Features

Product Description:
Victron Kit 22 – DC-DC, MPPT with 115W Solar Panel and IP22 Off-Grid Campervan Charger Kit

The Victron Kit 22 – DC-DC, MPPT, 115W Solar Panel, and IP22 Off-Grid Charger Kit is a complete power management system, designed to charge your leisure battery from multiple sources including solar, vehicle alternator, and mains power. This all-in-one solution is perfect for campervans, motorhomes, and off-grid setups, providing efficient energy distribution, advanced circuit protection, and easy installation.

Key Features

  • Triple Charging System:
    • Victron Orion-Tr 12/12 30A DC-DC Charger allows for efficient alternator charging while driving.
    • Victron SmartSolar MPPT 100/20 charge controller ensures maximum efficiency from the 115W solar panel.
    • Victron IP22 12V/30A mains charger provides fast and safe charging from shore power.
  • High-Efficiency Solar Power: Includes a 115W Victron mono solar panel, MC4 connectors, and cables for easy installation.
  • Pre-Wired for Easy Installation: Comes with wiring packs, fuse holders, bus bars, and pre-cut cables to reduce setup time.
  • Complete Circuit Protection: Equipped with a 4-way MIDI fuse holder, 175A mega fuse, and additional 30A ,40A & 60A MIDI fuses to ensure system safety and efficiency.
  • Integrated AC Power Distribution: Features two 25A mains consumer units, a 3-pin switched socket, and a surface-mounted back box for seamless AC integration.
  • Customizable Mounting Options: Choose between black or white solar panel mounting supports, corner fixings, cable glands, and Sikaflex adhesive for a secure, professional finish.
  • Battery Compatibility: Available without a battery, or upgrade to:
    • 12V 110Ah AGM deep cycle battery.

Fiamma Ultra Box Rear Motorhome Box Storage
Product Description:
Fiamma Ultra-Box 320, 360 and 500

Motorhome Rear Storage Box

The Fiamma Ultra Box is a motorhome rear box for additional storage. These compact rear boxes are available in a variety of models including the 320, 360 and 500, each with varying dimensions to suit your needs. This luggage box attaches directly to the rear of your motorhome and campervan or on a bike rack. These Fiamma Ultra Box Rear Storage Boxes vary in size, we off the 320L, 360L and 500L options. Get yours today for additional campervan storage on all your roadtrip adventures. Suitable for bike racks, campervans, motorhomes, cars and vans.

 

Featuring water tight foam seals, flexible netting for your luggage, and an air assisted opening for smooth open and close functionality. With an included Carry-Bike kit for easily installation onto the Carry Bike, Carry Bike Pro C, Carry Bike T5, and Carry Bike for T5 Pro and T6 Pro.

 

*Note that Ultra Box instruction manual does NOT explain hot to fit Carry Bike Pro C, however Fiamma have confirmed that this can be done.

 

Ultra Box Key Features:

  • Variety of Options: Three different sizes available including the 320L, 360L, and 500L.
  • Weather Resistance: High-quality matierals make this rear storage box resistant to weather conditions, damage and UV rays.
  • Versatile Storage: Features a flexible luggage net for storing a variety of items.
  • Bike Rack Compatibility: Can be fitted to most rear mounted Fiamma Carry Bikes except those with offset rails.

Product Description:
Fiamma Plastic Warning Sign for Motorhome Bike Rack

Rear Carry Bike Warning Signal

The Fiamma Plastic Warning Sign is necessary for your bike rack attached to the rear of your motorhome, campervan, van or car. This robust plastic 50 by 50 reflective warning signal can attached to the rear of your Fiamma Carry Bike or can be fitted in the clear pocket of the Fiamma Bike Rack Cover. This bike rack sign has been designed for easy installation and ideal use with 4 reflectors included. For use on the rear of your motorhome and Carry-Bike rack.

 

Installation could not be easier! Simply secure using the 4 eyelet holes in each corner, or fit using the clear pocket of the Fiamma bike cover. Ideal for long trips carrying a protruding load that extends beyond the rear bumper, including bike racks and trailers. Compulsory when travelling in Italy and Spain.

Product Name: Fiamma Carry 2 Bike Caravan XL A - 02096-23A
Product Description:
Fiamma 2 Bike Rack for Caravan A-Frame

Caravan XL A Carry-Bike

The Fiamma Carry-Bike Caravan XL A bike rack is a great solution for bike storage on the road. This bike rack fits to a touring caravans A-frame used for towing, including the Hobby type with extended frame and the new Alko chassis. The Fiamma Carry Bike XL A allows your bikes to be securely stored in between your campervan and your car. Able to carry a maximum of two bikes, this bike rack comes supplied with two fastening strips and two bike rails. Able to take on a maximum load of 50kg, you can support up to two standard bikes or two e-bikes.

 

The upper structure of this carry bike rack pivots forwards when bikes are not mounted to allow access to the caravans storage compartment, allow you to tilt this rack to gain access to your caravans front boot. Quick installation that does not require any drilling. See attached video for ideal installation.

 

Key Features:

  • Able to store up to two standard bikes or two e-bikes
  • Comes supplied with 2x Security Strips, 2x Rail Quick Pro (bike rails), 1x Brackets, 1x Fitting Instructions
  • Tilts forwards to allow access to caravan front boot

Caravan & Motohome Levelling Ramp

The Fiamma Level Up Ramp will ensure that your campervan, caravan or motorhome is perfectly level even when parked on uneven ground. This set of two levelling ramps are compact and easy to use. Use this level system for an even surface when your campervan is parked, improving general operation of equipment when stationary. Unlike wooden ramps, these ramps are made from high quality UV-resistant polyethene and will not crack or break and is easy to clean. The Level Up Ramps are multi-levelled, featuring three step up levels for improved positioning.

 

Designed with ridges to improve tyre grip to avoid slipping and to remain stationary. Made with a non-skid finish to improve friction and avoid slipping, allowing your caravan to remain in one place.

  • Ridged surface to improve grip on tyres

  • Lightweight and rust-proof material
  • Non-skid finish to avoid tyre slipping
  • Designed for long life

Product Name: Easy Camp Footprint for Skarvan 4 and Romsdal 4 Tent
Product Description:
Easy Camp Footprint for Skarvan 4 and Romsdal 4 Tent

This purpose-built footprint for the Easy Camp Skarvan 4 and Romsdal 4 tent is ideal for any camper seeking to prolong their tent's lifespan. It protects the tent's groundsheet from dirt, abrasion, and potential damage caused by uneven or rough terrain, whilst simplifying clean-up after each trip. Furthermore, the footprint provides a layer of insulation, minimising the transfer of cold from the ground and enhancing comfort during sleep. To prevent rainwater from being channelled underneath the tent floor, please ensure that the footprint is completely covered by the tent itself.

Easy Camp Footprint Features

  • Made to perfectly fit underneath the Skarvan 4 and Romsdal 4
  • 100% polyethylene to protect the underside of your tent.

Footprint Specifications:

  • Weight: 1.3kg
  • Material: 100% polyethylene
  • Pack Size: 32cm x 25cm x 5.41cm
Product Availability: The Easy Camp footprint is  available with a next-day courier.

Product Name: Outdoor Revolution Cayman DT Driveaway Awning Low
Product Description:
Outdoor Revolution Cayman DT Driveaway Awning Low

Based on the popular Cayman poled and sleeve drive-away awning.

Introducing the Outdoor Revolution Cayman DT Driveaway Awning Low. This lightweight and compact awning offers a quick and simple pitch thanks to its two fibreglass poles. Enjoy versatile access with large front and side doors, plus a convenient entry door in the tunnel for direct vehicle access. The doors are fitted with bug mesh to keep breezes in and pests out. The large clear windows have privacy curtains for night time and the door can be made into a large canopy for protection from the sun or showers (canopy poles needed, not included). The front of the awning has a small eyebrow canopy to create a small shelter.

Increase the space in your awning with an optional two-berth annexe (not included).

Outdoor Revolution Cayman DT Features

  • Fully sewn-in PE groundsheet.
  • 4mm & 6mm twin connection rail.
  • Twin zip back tunnel access doors.
  • Adjustable webbing pegging system.
  • PVC windows with toggle-in privacy blinds
  • 120HDE all weather lightweight fabric.
  • Roof ventilation system with storm cover.
  • Front facing eyebrow canopy with fibreglass pole.
  • Zip back front & side door with Phoenix mesh ventilation panel.
  • Inner cowl tension straps and cowl bungee for an adjustable vehicle fit.
  • Zip out rear door to take an optional Cayman sleeping annexe
  • Lightweight and robust Dura Tech fibreglass poled frame
  • Includes peg bag and carry bag

Cayman DT Driveaway Awning Low Specification

  • Weight: 13.6kg
  • Pack Size: 72 x 33 x 33cm
  • Footprint: 300 x 300cm (+80cm cowl depth)
  • Hydrostatic Head: 3000mm
  • Height Minimum: 180cm
  • Height Maximum: 220cm
Product Warranty: The Outdoor Revolution Cayman DT driveaway awning has a 1 year warranty
Product Availability: The Outdoor Revolution Cayman DT driveaway awning is available on a next-day courier

Product Description:
Dometic CVI1525 2-Zone Campervan Induction Hob

High-Performance Cooking for Motorhomes and Boats

Upgrade your mobile kitchen with the Dometic CVI1525, a compact and efficient 2-zone campervan induction hob designed for motorhomes, campervans, and boats. This sleek and modern hob features an easy-to-clean glass surface, making it perfect for compact spaces. With intuitive touch controls and multiple power settings, it offers precise heat adjustment for a variety of cooking needs. The CVI1525 is energy-efficient, operating within a 10 A / 2300 W limit, making it ideal for campsites or off-grid adventures. Built-in safety functions, including automatic shut-off, provide peace of mind while cooking on the move.

Key Features:

  • Dual Cooking Zones: 1000 W (left) and 1300 W (right) for flexible meal preparation.
  • Compact & Stylish Design: Measuring 525 x 350 mm, ideal for small kitchens.
  • Easy to Clean: Smooth glass surface makes post-cooking cleanup effortless.
  • Safe & Reliable: Features built-in safety functions, including automatic shut-off.

Specifications:

  • Power Output: 1000 W (left zone), 1300 W (right zone)
  • Power Supply: 230V / 10 A
  • Dimensions: 525 x 350 mm
  • Control Type: Touch sensor
  • Surface Material: Glass
  • Installation Type: Built-in

Product Name: Adventurer Campervan Cassette Window Blind and Flyscreen
Product Description:
Adventurer Cassette Window Blinds

The Adventurer Cassette Window Blinds feature a stylish curved PVC frame, perfect for your ongoing van conversion. Available in three colours including black, white and the new elegant beige colour to suit the aesthetic and design of your campervan interior. These black out blinds are perfect for keeping the light out and ideal for van conversions, caravans, motorhomes and campervans.

These slimline blinds can be stopped in any position and are held together with a magnetic strip, allowing you to adjust the brightness level of your campervan interior. Featuring a practical high-quality flyscreen that is used to keep the bugs out even when your window is fully open. The material used for the fly screen and blind is specially designed for durability and extended usage, which makes them ideal for for motorhomes, caravans, RV's, van conversions, horseboxes or boats.

Please select your desired size and colour above, the sizes are based on cutout size rather than overall. 

Black Out Blinds Key Features

  • Pleated blind for space saving stylish design
  • Integrated bug net for maximum ventilation whilst keeping insects out
  • Fully black-out blinds for added privacy and light control
  • Adjustable position for interior brightness control
  • Fully customisable colour, select between three stylish colours; black, white or beige or match the interior design of your van

Product Name: Cavagna LPG Gas Regulator Bulkhead 8mm for Caravan
Product Description:
Caravan and Marine Gas Regulator Kit M20

Reg Kit 8mm Outlet

Gas regulator kit with brass elbow pipe fitting, 8mm outlet fittings. This gas regulator can be used in red vapour tanks, alu bottles and LPGSHOP composite refillable cylinders. Compatible with various gases including propane, butane, and LPG mix. Offering 30mbar outlet gas pressure to keep your gas appliances running efficiently. Designed to be used in motorhomes and caravans, this gas regulator offers consistent performance while on the road.

On the inlet side, the M20 1.5 parallel thread, also known as W20 is a standard fitting for caravans, offering wide compatibility across! An 8mm copper pipe compression fitting can be removed to get 3/8" NPT female thread fitted. Included in the box is a bracket to secure the regulator to bulkhead fitting. The inlet should be positioned upwards, higher than the bottle outlet. Compliant with EN 16129 Annex D Standards.

Product Name: WHALE Watermaster IC Upgrade Pack High Flow Pump Control
Product Description:
Whale Watermaster IC Upgrade Pack

Intelligent Control Watermaster Upgrade Kit

The Whale Watermaster IC (Intelligent Control) Upgrade Kit is an enhancement to your caravans pump. This upgrade kit allows your pump to automatically detect when water container is empty and switches pump off to prevent your pump from running dry, this prolongs the life of your submersible pump. Additionally, this Intelligent Pump Controller can remove the need for a surge damper and adjustment of the pressure switch.

Simple installation process, easily retro-fitted to any Whale Watermaster pressure switched socket. High-Flow pump should also be used with upgrade kit (sold separately). Not compatible with inline pressure switch systems. This Watermaster upgrade stops the pump from pulsating at high voltages and stops the pump running continuously at low voltages, prolonging the battery life of your pump.

Upgrade Pack Key Features:

  • Stops pump form pulsating at high voltages
  • Stops the pump running continuously at low voltages
  • Can detect if the water container has run dry, and turns pump off
  • No longer require surge damper
  • Prolongs and protects submersible pump
  • Prolongs battery life
  • Built-in fault diagnostic system
  • One-step calibration process
  • Easily retro-fitted
  • Suitable for ES1001 and ES5001
Product Availability: #Delivery 1 - 2 working days

Product Description:
Fiamma Bike Block Pro 4 Carry-Bike Fixing Clamp

Secure Bike Blocking System

The Fiamma Bike Block Pro 4 is the strongest clamping system for securing your bike onto the bicycle Carry-Bike rack. Suitable for all Carry-Bike models, this bike blocking system allows you to secure a fourth bike to the back of your campervan or motorhome. The Bike Block Pro 4 has the longest arm reach from the Bike Block range, this fixing clamp is usually used to secure a 4th bike on your motorhome.

 

The Quick Front Clamp fits round and oval bike tubes, with a diameter ranging from 25mm to 80mm. Reaching between 54cm to 57cm, this carry bike accessory lets you ensure the security of your bike on the road. Secure your bike safely with this adjustable blocking clamp suitable for all Fiamma Carry Bike models. the Bike Block Pro 4 is designed with a non-scratch base to prevent damaging your bike and bike rack.

 

Blocking System Key Features:

  • Adjustable from 54cm to 57cm
  • Non-scratch base fit
  • Suitable for all Fiamma Carry-Bike models
  • Can be used on other bike racks with a tube diameter of 28mm to 35mm

Product Name: Fiamma Premium Full Motorhome Cover M/L
Product Description:
Fiamma Motorhome Cover Premium Medium and Large

Full Motorhome Cover

The Fiamma Cover Premium is a full cover for your motorhome. Available in two sizes; medium and large to fit over a variety of campers. Suitable to protect your motorhome from sun, UV rays, dirt, dust and weather. This newer style of cover has improve functionality compared to the previous Fiamma Cover Top. This Full Motorhome Cover fits the whole vehicle with an integrated belt traction system. On this cover, there are no studs, this decreases the risk of tearing and prolongs the life of your cover. Additionally, this improved van cover comes with reflective strips and air vents which increase ventilation and prevents condensation under the canopy.

 

The breathable fabric prevents humidity and maintains a cool temperature inside your motorhome. Featuring a locking system with sturdy plastic buckles and six zip fasteners. With four plastic buckles to fix the lower part of the fabric in place, and Velcro to fix side panels in place when they are full zipped open. This functionality can allow entry into your motorhome from both sides.

 

Motorhome Cover Key Features:

  • 4 plastic buckles to secure the lower part of the cover
  • 6 zip fasteners (3 per side) to allow easy entry to your motorhome
  • Fasten open side panels with Velcro to fix side panels in place
  • Air vents to provide ventilation that prevents condensation and pooling of water
  • Locking system with sturdy plastic buckles
  • Reflective strips to increase visibility during storage

Product Description:
Fiamma Motorhome Carry-Bike CL Motorhome Cycle Rack Bike Carrier

Motorhome Rear Bike Rack

The Fiamma Carry-Bike CL is an affordable rear bike rack for compact coach-built motorhomes. This bike rack is the perfect choice for your motorhome, as the Carry-Bike CL is designed to be compact and versatile to fit into limited spaces. Designed to carry two bikes, the Carry-Bike CL can easily be adjusted to add a third bike by attaching a suitable Bike Block Pro (sold separately).

 

The CL is part of the Fiamma Carry-Bike L series, designed for 'bolt through wall' installation, to be installed below your motorhomes rear window. This Fiamma bike racket is for motorhomes without pre-installed mounting brackets. All required mountings and fittings are included in the box. This Rear Bike Rack features an adjustable height from 40cm to 50cm, ideal for installing onto motorhomes with a rear window.

 

Carry-Bike CL Key Features:

  • Quick Rail Pro for quick and secure locking wheel to the rail
  • Bike Block Pro for securely fastening bike in place with anti scratch pads
  • Protective Bumpers to protect you bikes from scratches and clashes during travel
  • Adjustable Height from 40cm to 50cm
  • Lower Fixing Bar for installing onto motorhomes with rear window
  • Quick Lock Straps to secure your bikes hassle free
  • Easy Position System to offset bikes and prevent clashing
  • Comes supplied with:
    • 2 x Rail Quick 128 bike supports
    • 1 x Strip Red bike frame holder
    • 1 x Bike Block Pro 3 bike frame holder
    • 2 x Rack Holders
    • 1 x Security Strip
    • Installation Kit

Product Name: Calor Gas Bottles – Available for Collection Only
Product Description:
Calor Gas Bottles for Campervans, Caravans, BBQs & Off-Grid Use

In Store and In Stock - Collection Only

We stock genuine Calor Gas bottles, the UK’s most trusted brand for portable LPG. Ideal for campervans, caravans, motorhomes, BBQs, patio heaters, and off-grid living. Whether you're starting fresh or looking to exchange an existing Calor bottle, we’ve got you covered in-store.

We suggest you give us a call before you come to make sure we have a bottle available for exchange.

We supply both:

  • New customers (starting a Cylinder Refill Agreement), and
  • Those needing a Calor exchange

Bottles We Stock

  • 7kg Butane
  • 6kg Propane
  • 13kg Patio Gas

New to Calor?

If you're new to Calor gas and don't already have a bottle, we’ll set you up with a full gas cylinder along with a Cylinder Refill Agreement (CRA).

This agreement gives you the right to exchange your Calor bottle in the future.

Please note: all Calor bottles remain the property of Calor Gas Ltd. The CRA licenses you to use and exchange cylinders as needed.

Already Have and Looking to Exchange?

If you already have a Calor gas bottle, you can easily swap your empty one for a full replacement, as long as it’s from the same group. Calor bottles are grouped by gas type and size, and exchanges are strictly like-for-like.

We only accept exchanges within the same group. No cross-group swaps are permitted.

Calor Exchange Groups

  • Group 1: Butane Small – Cube, 4.5kg, 7kg
  • Group 2: Propane – 3.9kg, 6kg, 6kg Lite
  • Group 3: Patio – 13kg Patio Gas

If your bottle is in the same group as the one you need, we’ll be happy to exchange it for a full one.

How We Work

We are currently set up to offer new Calor Cylinder Refill Agreements (CRA) and same-group exchanges only.

If you are:

  • Looking to return an empty bottle without an exchange, or
  • Trying to swap a bottle for one outside its group (e.g. Butane - Propane),

You will need to visit your nearest Calor Gas Centre for assistance.

We can still issue a new CRA if you're switching to a different group, but we cannot accept your old bottle. It must be returned to Calor directly.

Product Name: Fiamma Caravanstore Zip XL Privacy Room
Product Description:
Fiamma Caravanstore Zip XL Privacy Room

The Caravanstore ZIP XL is the latest Fiamma have to offer with more extension, more living space and more comfort. The Caravanstore Zip XL canopy and privacy easily join together with Fiamma's sturdy zips allowing for a fast installation.

The Fiamma Caravan Store XL Awning can be used in connection with the Caravanstore Zip Awning. The Fiamma Caravanstore Zip XL Awning is NOT INCLUDED! Purchase Zip XL Awning HERE.

More space with more light!

The Fiamma Caravanstore Zip XL not only benefits from the additional extension compared to the previous Caravanstore Zip, it also benefits from the increased size of the side panels allowing for larger open-able windows with built in mosquito nets providing plenty of light and ventilation on those sunny days and an interchangeable front panel giving the option of positioning the door left or right.

The Fiamma Caravanstore Privacy Room features include:

  • 1x front panel with window with mosquito net and roll-able door
  • 2x side panels with windows with mosquito net
  • 1x Curtain kit for all the windows of the enclosure
  • 1x Rapid Set CS installation kit (2+2 aluminium tension poles)
  • 1x kit elastic hooks for secure fixing
  • 1x storage bag Mega Bag dim. 140x27x40cm.
  • The canopy locks into existing awning rail on your Caravan, Campervan or Motorhome
  • Once locked suitable to be left mounted on either Caravan, Campervan or Motor home whilst in transit

*Please note: a Zip Canopy can not accommodate a standard Privacy Room, and a Zip Privacy Room can not be fitted to an ordinary Awning, if you're planning to buy part second hand on eBay etc, please beware*

Note to customers in Northern Ireland - unfortunately due to shipping costs we cannot fulfil any orders to Northern Ireland. Any orders placed will be refunded.

Product Name: Vision Plus STATUS 570 Directional TV & WiFi Antenna + Router
Option Set: STATUS 570 Directional TV & WiFi Antenna + Router
Product Description:
Vision Plus STATUS 570 Directional TV & WiFi Antenna and Router

High-Performance TV and 5G WiFi Antenna with 4G/5G Router Options

The Vision Plus STATUS 570 Directional TV & WiFi Antenna + Router is the ultimate all-in-one solution for staying connected on the go. Designed for caravans, motorhomes, and mobile living, this system ensures you receive high-quality digital TV, FM, and DAB radio reception, while also providing reliable, high-speed internet. The directional TV antenna delivers excellent signal reception, and the built-in 5G WiFi antenna ensures strong wireless connectivity. You can choose between a 4G or 5G router, both of which are unlocked to accept any SIM card for flexible internet access. With easy installation, a built-in signal amplifier, and signal finder, the STATUS 570 makes setting up simple, so you can focus on your journey rather than tech issues. Available in black or white, this sleek system blends functionality with style, complementing your vehicle’s design.

Vision Plus Status 570 Features:

  • Directional TV Antenna – Enjoy superior reception for digital TV, FM, and DAB radio.
  • 5G WiFi Antenna – Ensures strong and stable wireless connectivity.
  • 4G or 5G Router Options – Choose between 4G or 5G router models, both unlocked to accept any SIM card.
  • Up to 300Mbps Internet Speeds – Stream, browse, and stay connected with fast data transfer.
  • VP5 Amplifier & Signal Finder – Easily locate and fine-tune signals for the best reception.
  • 12-24V Power Supply – Designed for off-grid use, ideal for remote adventures.
  • Quick & Easy Installation – Roof-mounted with an internal mast for a secure, streamlined setup.

TV and WiFi Antenna and Router Specifications:

  • Antenna Type: Directional TV Antenna (Digital TV, FM & DAB Radio)
  • WiFi Antenna: 5G
  • Router Options: 4G or 5G (Unlocked, accepts any SIM)
  • Internet Speed: Up to 300Mbps
  • Power Supply: 12-24V DC
  • Mounting: Roof-mounted with internal mast
  • Warranty: 3 Years (Battery: 1 Year)
  • Colour Options: Black or White
  • Dimensions: 412mm x 348mm x 108mm (L x W x H)
  • Weight: Approx. 2.5kg

Product Name: Dometic CFX5 45 Electric Compressor Cool Box
Product Description:
Dometic CFX5 45 Electric Compressor Cool Box 

High-Performance Cooling for Outdoor Adventurers

The Dometic CFX5 45 is the ultimate cooling solution for outdoor enthusiasts. Whether you're setting up camp, going on a road trip, or exploring off-grid locations, this powerful electric cool box keeps your food and drinks fresh without the hassle of ice. Featuring advanced compressor technology, the CFX5 45 rapidly cools and freezes down to -22°C (-7°F), ensuring optimal food preservation in any climate. With a durable, impact-resistant design, it’s built to withstand rugged outdoor use, making it the perfect companion for adventure seekers. Its energy-efficient operation allows for extended use with minimal power consumption, while the smart app control lets you monitor and adjust temperatures remotely via Bluetooth or Wi-Fi. The spacious 46L capacity provides ample room for all your essentials, making the Dometic CFX5 45 a reliable and versatile cooling solution for any journey.

Dometic CFX5 45 Compressor Cool Box Features:

  • High-Performance Cooling: Rapid cooling and freezing down to -7°F (-22°C) for optimal food and drink storage.
  • Energy Efficient: Low power consumption with advanced insulation, perfect for extended trips.
  • Durable Construction: Reinforced corners and rugged materials ensure durability in tough environments.
  • Smart Control: Adjust and monitor temperatures remotely via the Dometic app using Bluetooth or Wi-Fi.
  • Spacious Design: 46L capacity, ideal for storing large quantities of food and drinks.

Dometic CFX5 45 Electric Cooler Specifications:

  • Capacity: 46L (holds up to 67 x 12 oz cans)
  • Dimensions: 715 mm (depth) x 475 mm (height) x 398 mm (width)
  • Weight: 18.7 kg
  • Temperature Range: -7°F (-22°C) to 68°F (20°C)
  • Power Supply: 100-240V AC and 12/24V DC
  • Noise Level: 41 dB(A)

Product Name: Outdoor Revolution Q Cayman T1 Driveaway Awning
Product Description:
Outdoor Revolution Q Cayman T1 Driveaway Awning

A New Driveaway Style Awning in Two Models

Introducing the all-new Outdoor Revolution Q Cayman T1 Driveaway Awnings, part of the innovative 'Q' range of two quick-pitch models.

Utilising Outdoor Revolution's quick-pitch erection system, this awning offers incredibly fast and easy pitching, alongside a compact pack size which is perfect when space is at a premium. The awnings connect to vehicles with the pre-attached twin keder strips, in sizes 4mm and 6mm. Inside, both models come with a handy removable groundsheet and fully zip-back front, rear and side doors with tie-backs. The tinted PVC windows come with toggle-in curtains for privacy and the door features an eyebrow canopy for extra cover.

Crafted from their reliable lightweight fabric, and with a hydrostatic head of 3000mm, the Q Cayman provides a superb alternative to air awnings and is reliable come rain or shine. The models are available in both driveaway awning and driveaway tailgate awning options.

Outdoor Revolution Q Cayman T1 Features

  • Tailgate awning can be used on tailgates and barndoors.
  • Fibreglass pole system.
  • Can be pitched in under 15 minutes.
  • 120HDE high density all weather lightweight fabric.
  • Hydrostatic head of 3000mm.
  • Removable PE groundsheet.
  • Rear left and right cowl entrance doors.
  • 4mm & 6mm twin keder.
  • Zip back front, side and rear doors with tie backs.
  • Tinted PVC windows with toggle curtains.
  • Front door eyebrow canopy.
  • Clip points to add an optional 2 berth inner tent (not included).
  • Colour coded teal guylines with quick adjusters.
  • Includes peg set, footprint and carry bag.

Q Cayman T1 Specification

  • Pitch Time: 15 minutes
  • Hydrostatic Head: 3000mm
  • Keder: 4/6mm

Driveaway Awning:

  • Weight: 14.35kg
  • Pack Size: 113cm x 33cm x 33cm
  • Footprint: 300 x 300cm

Driveaway Tailgate Awning:

  • Weight: 12.85kg
  • Pack Size: 105cm x 23cm x 23cm
  • Footprint: 250 x 250cm

Product Description:
Outdoor Revolution Pronto Pro 4 Windbreak

The Outdoor Revolution Pronto Pro 4 Windbreak has an exceptionally quick pitching system thanks to its pop-up fibreglass poles, making it ideal for camping, beach, or road trip adventures. Constructed from a robust 600HD high-density all-weather premium fabric, this windbreak offers excellent durability and protection against the elements. It features fibreglass upright poles for enhanced stability, especially in windy conditions, and incorporates a clear PVC window in the central panels to allow visibility while maintaining privacy.

The inclusion of Kador strips at both ends ensures easy attachment to campervan and motorhome awning rails, as well as compatibility with Screenhouse Kador Connectors for versatile setups. Designed for convenience and practicality, the Pronto Pro 4 Windbreak includes adjustable webbing peg-down points for secure anchoring on various terrains and comes complete with guylines and steel pegs. Whilst pitched with a size of approximately 500cm in length and 125cm in height, it packs down into a small carry bag for easy storage.

This windbreak is an ideal companion for camping trips and outdoor events, offering reliable shelter from wind, light rain, and sun.

Pronto Pro 4 Windbreak Features

  • Strong fibreglass poles.
  • Clear PVC windows in 2 centre panels.
  • Pro 600HD high density all weather premium fabric.
  • Includes carry/storage bag, guylines and steel peg set.
  • Kador strip to both ends for attaching to a vertical awning rail.

Outdoor Revolution Windbreak Specification

  • Weight: 8.25kg
  • Pack Size: 108cm x 21cm x 9cm
  • Pitching Time: 2 minutes

Product Name: Outdoor Revolution Cayman Air T3 Lite Driveaway Awning
Product Description:
Outdoor Revolution Cayman Air T3 Lite Driveaway Awning

The Cayman Air T3 Lite Driveaway Awning from Outdoor Revolution is a lightweight and affordable inflatable awning, based on the popular Movelite T3 design. This awning offers quick and easy pitching, making it ideal for campervan and motorhome owners. Available in two cowl height options, and with a 4mm/6mm kador strip, it ensures a secure fit to a wide range of vehicles. This awning comes bundled with a footprint for convenience.

The awnings feature large roll-back doors on all sides, providing excellent access. An optional annexe can be attached to the rear, offering extra sleeping space without compromising the main living area. The awning has a sewn-in groundsheet to keep insects at bay and there is plenty of ventilation thanks to mesh fly screen panels, helping to keep condensation to a minimum. Finished with teal trim and guy lines as well as tinted windows, the Cayman Air T3 Lite provides a practical and comfortable outdoor living space.

Cayman Air T3 Lite Features

  • Open fronted front porch.
  • Under window ventilation.
  • Fully sewn in PE groundsheet.
  • Rear zip-back cowl access door.
  • Air frame system with DSV valves.
  • Adjustable webbing pegging system.
  • Cowl entry door into front porch area.
  • PVC windows with toggle privacy blinds.
  • 4mm & 6mm twin cowl connection kador.
  • Includes manual air pump, peg set and carry bag.
  • Roof ventilation system with Velcro down storm cover.
  • 120HDE Hex high density all weather lightweight fabric.
  • Zip-back front door with PVC window and toggle curtain.
  • Inner cowl tension straps and bungee for an adjustable vehicle fit.

Outdoor Revolution Cayman Air T3 Lite Specification

  • Weight: 17.57kg
  • Hydrostatic Head: 3000mm
  • Pack Size: 80cm x 44cm x 42cm
  • Footprint: 360 x 310cm (+100cm cowl depth)
  • Height Range Low: 180-220cm
  • Height Range Mid: 220-255cm

Navy Load Built-In Hob Unit W/Glass Cover - 2 Burners LH/RH Sink

Two Burner Hob with Sink

The Built-in 2 Burner Hob Unit by Navy Load comes with a left hand or right hand sink and a glass cover. Made from stainless steel, with 1 SemiRapid Burner and one Auxiliary Burner, making this hob ideal for your motorhome, campervan and caravan. This combination hob unit features piezo ignition, two gas burners, a sink installed on either the right-hand side or left-hand side, and two movable pan support grids mounted on anti-vibration grommets. This compact unit saves space by combining these two commonly used kitchen components, ideal for small vehicles such as your campervan, caravan and motorhome.

2 Burner Hob with Sink Key Features:

  • Piezo Ignition: Pre-fitted piezo ignition system for 12V power supply compatibility

Product Name: Dometic DB1R Campervan Motorhome Roller Blind - Cream White
Product Description:
Dometic DB1R Campervan Caravan Motorhome Roller Blinds

Window Blinds - CreamWhite RAL9001

The Dometic DB1R Window Roller Blinds come in a variety of sizes to fit a range of windows. These black out roller blinds are ideal for campervans, caravans and motorhomes. These modern blinds can be adjusted to precise positions and fly screen can be fitted from the top or bottom of the window. The black-out blinds come with a fly screen and are separately adjustable thanks to an easy-to-use cord system, made for darkening your campervan by keeping the light out. The Dometic DB1R roller blind gives you privacy and comfort while keeping insects out of your home. With no visible screws, this CreamWhite blind is designed to blend in perfectly with campervan and motorhome interiors. Additionally, the DB1R blind has a slim frame profile, giving you maximum field of vision. 

Caravan Black Out Blind Key Features:

  • Ideal for motorhome windows
  • Pre-assembled for easy fitting
  • Black-out blind and fly-screen can be separately adjusted
  • Fly screen can be fitted top or bottom
  • Maximum field of vision due to slim profiles
  • Hidden screws are not visible
  • Tool-free tensioning of blind and fly screen

Product Name: Nuuk 3 Way Camping Coolbox 240v Mains 12v LPG Gas Portable 40 litre Fridge
Product Description:
Nuuk 3 Way Camping Coolbox 240v Mains 12v LPG Gas Portable Fridge

40L Portable 12v Camping Fridge

The Nuuk 3 Way Camping Coolbox is perfect for all your camping adventures. This fridge is 3 way, meaning it can be powered on gas, 240 mains electric, or 12V electric. This offers power flexibility, making this fridge great for off-grid camping using the 12v or gas options. You can also take advantage of 240V mains electric when you have it!

The Nuuk 3 way portable fridge can be used in any conditions, capable of keeping the inside of the fridge 25 degrees cooler that the outside temperature. Meaning this powerful camping fridge can still work in hot conditions.

Additionally, the low wattage of this 12v LPG gas fridge means that it can be used anywhere, on all camp sites without overloading electrics. This also means that the fridge is cheaper to run as it draws a lower wattage than non-low wattage items.

Key Features

  • Low wattage
  • Works on LPG gas, 240V mains and 12V
  • Large 40 litre capacity
  • Noiseless operation
  • Premium quality parts and production
  • Able to cool 25 degrees below surrounding temperature
  • Efficient cooling
  • Piezo ignition for use with LPG gas
  • Auto switch between 240V and 12V

Product Name: MaxxFan MaxxAir Interior Garnish Ring for MaxxAir MaxxFan Deluxe Caravan Roof Vent
Product Description:
MaxxAir MaxxFan Deluxe Caravan Roof Vent Interior Garnish Ring

Spare Garnish Ring Interior

The MaxxAir MaxxFan Deluxe Caravan Roof Vent Interior Garnish Ring is available in two sizes; 350mm x 350mm and 400mm x 400mm. Each garnish ring is either 5" or 3" deep and is used as a spare part or replacement part for your MaxxFan Deluxe Caravan Roof Vent with Fan. Please Note: the 5" depth is only available with 350mm x 350mm model. The interior Garnish Trim Ring must be trimmed to fit your particular RV roof thickness. To accomplish this, measure the distance from the vehicle ceiling surface to each corner of the MAXXFAN Control Plate. Most campervan, caravan and motorhome roofs have some slope, so measuring each corner is necessary. The Garnish ring should be cut 1/4” to 1/2” longer than the dimensions measured at each corner. To do this, please consult the directions in the instructions provided. 

MaxxFan Interior Garnish Ring Specifications:

  • Manufacturer SKU number: 10-20211-3.0 & 10-20213I40-3 & 10-20211
  • Suitable for MaxxFan models including:

Leisurewize Carawash Portable Caravan Jet Washer with 7M Hose

12V Car and Caravan Washing Cleaner 20 Litre

The Leisurewize Carawash is a portable campervan, caravan, motorhome, van and car cleaner. This 12V jet was comes with a 7m hose, long enough to easily clean your whole vehicle. Use the Carawash jet wash to clean your caravan, campervan, motorhome, van and car. Don't limit this power cleaner use to just leisure vehicles, this water cleaner can be used for camping and gardens, perfect for your home's drive, patio, decking and outdoor furniture.

Product Name: Avtex Tourer Three Plus Sat Nav 7" Touch Screen for Motorhome and Caravan
Product Description:
Avtex Tourer Three Plus Campervan Sat Nav with Built-in Dash Cam

Touchscreen 7" Motorhome Sat Nav

The Avtex Tourer Three Plus Sat Nav features a 7" touchscreen navigation system and a built-in dash cam. This Sat Nav is perfect for campervans, caravans and motorhomes as it tailors your journey to the size of your vehicle to avoid height, width and weight restricted roads whilst providing you with route warnings like sharp turns and steep hills. The Avtex Tourer Three Plus features a built-in dash cam that will record detected incidents throughout your journey in case of an accident. The incident detection (G-sensor) automatically saves footage on impact, but you can manually save footage too. The built-in dashcam records at 1080p HD and up to 30FPS with 140° field of view. The dashcam can also record GPS location, speed, date and time of when an incident occurred.

This smart sat nav provides exclusive access to the Caravan and Motorhome Club campsite database. This will let you find all Club campsites. In addition to this, other campsite databases such as ACSI, Trailer's Park, Campercontact and Michelin® Green Guide come pre-loaded to the Sat Nav device. The Avtex Tourer Three Plus offers free map updates for UK and Europe, allowing you to journey anywhere with the most up to date road maps.

Touchscreen Sat Nav Key Features:

  • 6.95" (17.7cm) Frameless HS Display
  • Pinch-to-zoom capacitive glass display
  • Built-in 1080p HD dash cam
  • Shows speed limits, height restrictions, road warnings, elevation profile and driver alerts such as collisions and lane departures. Perfect for use with touring caravan or motorhome
  • BirdsEye Satellite Imagery
  • Exclusive Caravan and Motorhome Club campsite database
  • Extensive European Caravan and Motorhome site databases
  • Free map updates included via PC, Mac or WiFi®
  • Hands-free features including Bluetooth® calling, smart notifications and voice-activated navigation
  • Road-trip ready with Tripadvisor ® Traveller Ratings and points of interest (POIs)
  • 16GB microSD card
  • Simple Mount Solution (non-powered/non-magnetic
  • Integrated Driving Recorder Interface to take pictures and save pictures
  • Garmin Vault dashcam video cloud storage
  • Manage/review video footage on device
  • Wireless backup camera compatible (not included)

Product Name: Avtex AMR104X Dual Sim CAT 6 4G Router and 4G/5G Antenna Mobile Internet System
Product Description:
Avtex AMR104X 4G Superfast Dual Sim Router

4G CAT 6 Mobile Internet Solution Dual Sim Superfast Router Package

The Avtex AMR104X superfast Category 6 router and 4-element antenna package provides fast internet speeds and features a 2.8" screen to view router performance such as signal strength, data usage, etc. With Dual SIM capability, you can easily switch between LTE and WiFi networks for better coverage and control over roaming costs, allowing you to save while travelling. The Avtex AMR104X antenna fully supports 3G, 4G and 5G to keep you connected wherever you travel.

The perfect road trip companion, the Avtex 4G router can take you anywhere. Whether its the coast, remote camp sites, touring parks and caravan sites, or the middle of nowhere! This router package delivers fast, reliable internet allowing you to stream and browse on your travels. Featuring a low profile MiMo antenna designed specifically for leisure vehicles, for maximum performance when stationary and in motion. Assuring you stay connected whether you're parked up or driving along the open road. When not in use, the built-in DC isolation switch powers off the router to minimise battery consumption in your off-grid setup.

Key Features:

Antenna

  • High Gain 4 Element antenna
  • 3G/4G/5G compatible antenna
  • Low profile omni directional MiMo antenna
  • Works in motion or stationery
  • Available in three colours including white, grey, and black

Router

  • 4G Category 6 LTE mobile router typically up to twice the speed of a standard CAT 4 device with speeds up to 300 Mbps
  • Fast, dependable internet perfect for streaming TV, video calls, and general browsing on the road
  • Dual SIM design enhances coverage and reduces roaming fees on European trips
  • Option to connect to existing campsite or home WiFi networks to save mobile data
  • Clear 2.8" LED colour display for easy network status checks
  • DC on/off isolation switch for battery-friendly operation
  • Connect multiple devices at once; phones, tablets, laptops, smart TVs and more!
  • Remote management system support
  • Easy mounting for quick installation in any leisure vehicle
  • 12V or 24V
  • E Mark, EN18031 and PSTI compliant

Product Description:
SunnCamp Tourer Motor Air Drive Away Campervan Awning

Elevate your touring experience with the SunnCamp Tourer Motor Air drive-away awning.

This campervan awning offers exceptional durability and effortless setup. With a 6000mm waterproof rating and flame-retardant properties, it ensures comfort and safety in all weather conditions.

The awning features easy access doors and a sewn-in groundsheet to keep draughts and bugs at bay. A spacious integral front porch with windows allows plenty of natural light into the awning for perfect for relaxation. The front features a large double access door which can be opened up for maximum airflow, while the side doors feature bug mesh netting and large windows with zip-up curtains. In addition, the Tourer Motor Air comes with a 2-berth inner tent, providing ample sleeping space.

This versatile awning comes complete with an inner bedroom, a drive-away pole (270cm) and clamp kit, tunnel adjustment strap, and three Air Storm Bars for enhanced stability.

The SunnCamp Tourer Motor Air driveaway awning comes in Low or Mid options to suit a range of vehicles.

Product Name: Mestic SPA Split Air Conditioner for Caravan and Motorhome
Product Description:
Mestic Split Air Conditioner for UK Caravan and Motorhome

Mestic Portable Motorhome Air Conditioning Unit

Available in two models to suit your cooling needs, the Mestic Split Air Conditioner is available now. A useful air conditioning unit that requires no permanent installation, convenient when installing a roof mounted unit isn't a practical option. The SPA-3100 AC is ideal for vans up to 5m, whereas the more powerful SPA-5100 air conditioning unit is ideal for caravan and motorhome vehicles up to 6m. 

Perfect for caravan and motorhome owners who need an effective cooling solution without the hassle of a rooftop installation. Especially suitable if your vehicle can't support a roof unit due to height and weight restrictions, or if solar panels are already installed.

Easy Installation

Super easy installation! No need for professional installation or technical fitting; simply hang in the window of your van when needed. Straightforward without hassle, and you can pack it away when not in use! An ideal portable solution for hot summer days, best used in caravan and motorhomes, for cooling, ventilation and dehumidifying.

Made up of two parts, the cooling half hangs inside to deliver fresh cool air into your motorhome, whilst the other half hangs outside to expel heat. This portable air conditioner easily connects with slim flexible hoses that fit through a slightly open window. No permanent fitting is required, simply install when it is needed using the included brackets.

Mestic Air Con Key Features:

  • Adjustable air flow: controls volume to the left and right
  • Timer function and Sleep/night mode
  • Environmentally Friendly Refrigerant R290
  • Atmospheric LED Lighting
  • Touchscreen operation with temperature display and Mestic smart app
  • Simple installation in window opening

Product Description:
Mestic Absorption Coolbox MAC-40 for Campervan, Caravan, Motorhome, Camping and BBQ

Electric Gas Cool Box AC/DC 30mbar

The Mestic Absorption Coolbox MAC-40 is a versatile camping coolbox that can be both powered by 12V mains, or by gas. This allows you to use this cooler box on the move when there are no mains power outlets nearby. This 42L absorption coolbox cools 25°C below the ambient temperature, keeping your drinks at just the right temperature. This 12V coolbox is ideal for keeping indoors as additional fridge storage or can be used outdoors while camping or for a barbecue in your campsite. Is also suitable for your caravan, campervan and motorhome holidays. 

The Mestic Absorption MAC-40 Coolbox features silent technology. This 42L electric cooler makes little to no noise, allowing you to enjoy nature in peace. With a 42 litre capacity, this cooler box is ideal for three to four people, perfect for a family of four enjoying a remote camping trip! The whopping size of this gas coolbox means that it can hold 2 Litre bottles! Perfect for water, soft drinks and milk.

Key Features:

  • Silent operation
  • Built-in spirit level
  • 42 Litre capacity, suitable for 2 litre bottles
  • Able to cool up to 25°C below ambient temperature
  • Highly versatile: Operates on 12V, 230V and gas, perfect for plugging into mains or outdoor camping
  • Perfect for adventurous holidays

Foldable Camping Stove

The Mestic Portable Folding Gas Cooker is a compact and foldable 2 burner camping stove that comes fitted with a griddle plate and a carry bag. This unique camping cooker uses screw threaded gas cartridges like the Outdoor Revolution Butane Propane Gas Cannister.

The Mestic MGC-150 camping stove has two 1.8kW burners and an electric ignition, two features that ensure you have an optimal cooking experience when using this camping stove. Once finished, simply clean the stove and place it back in the included carry bag.

Product Name: Mestic Camping Gas Cooker 30mbar 2, 3 and 4 Burner Stove
Product Description:
Mestic Gas Cooker 30mbar 2, 3, and 4 Burner Stoves

Camping Gas Stove MGC-200, MGC-300, MGC-400

The Mestic Camping Gas Cooker is available in 2, 3 and 4 burner versions. Featuring electric ignition for ease of use, and a safety valve, these stoves are very safe to use at your campsite, on the beach or at home. Extra safety measures have been put into place with the non-slip feet to ensure your cooker stays in one place. Easy to clean, simply remove the pan support and enameled parts to easily clean the appliance. Also featuring an integrated thermal safety device that ensures the gas supply is automatically shut off when the flame goes out, this is so that no gas escapes.

This portable camping cooker features a built-in lid used for covering the appliance when not in use. Additionally, this lid acts as a windbreak when your stove is on to prevent the flame from going out. This Mestic Gas Cooker is highly portable and versatile, suitable for camping and outdoor barbeques. These camping stoves use screw threaded gas cartridges like the Outdoor Revolution Butane Propane Gas Cannister.

The Mestic MGC-200 2 Burner Stove is equipped with two 2.2kW burners, perfect for cooking a small meal for two on the beach, in the park for a picnic, or at home for a barbeque. Gas consumption of 320 gr/h at 4.4kW. The Mestic MGC-300 3 Burner Stove utilises two 2.2kW burners and one 0.85kW burner, making this stove great for family days out, summer holidays and outside the caravan. Gas consumption of 382 gr/h at 5.25 kW. The Mestic MGC-400 4 Burner Stove featuring two 2.2 kW burners and two 1.2 kW burners, suitable for group picnics, family holidays and barbeques. Gas consumption of 496 gr/h at 6.8kW.

Key Features:

  • Electric ignition
  • Safety Valve
  • 2, 3, and 4 burner versions available
  • Non-slip feet
  • Integrated thermal safety device
