Belmont Pathway 4G Mobile WiFi Router

Portable 4G WiFi Router

The Belmont Leisure Pathway 4G Mobile WiFi Router is an ideal solution for portable internet connection. Stay connected with WiFi on the move with this 4G device. Whether you're working remotely, travelling or in remote areas, this Pathway router gives you reliable WiFi wherever you go.

With a simple installation, you can get connected in no time. Simply plug the router into a 12V or 240V power source and insert a SIM card from your chosen provider, then you're good to go. The DEAD•EZY range is carefully curated to deliver great value, targeting the essential needs of van and campervan conversions. Easy to install and manufactured to meet the high UK quality standards Dodo Mat is known for, it’s an ideal choice for DIY enthusiasts and professionals alike.

Lightweight yet effective, DEAD•EZY Deadening is perfect for car, van and campervan owners seeking a quieter, more comfortable ride—without adding unnecessary weight. The uniquely designed top layer not only simplifies installation but also conforms easily to complex surfaces.

Dodo Mat DEADN Hex is a premium self-adhesive, foil-backed sound deadening and vibration damping solution for your van or campervan. Simply cut, peel, and stick it onto your vehicle’s interior metal panels for effective damping of unwanted vibrations and deadening of structural noise.

Product Description:
Dodo DEAD-EZY Campervan Sound Deadening Vibration Damping Van Roll

The Dodo Mat DEAD-EZY Deadening Roll is an entry-level, self-adhesive, foil-backed sound deadening and vibration damping solution for van and campervan owners. Simply cut, peel, and stick it to the interior metal panels of your campervan or van for effective deadening of unwanted sound and damping of vibration.

The Dodo Mat DEAD-EZY Deadening Roll in dead easy to fit to your van or campervan, so you can make those panels as dead as a Dodo! To make installation even easier, the Dodo Mat DEAD-EZY Deadening Roll comes in a single large 5m rolled sheet—ideal for custom projects and covering larger surface areas with minimal joins.

The Dodo Mat DEAD-EZY range has been carefully selected to deliver outstanding value while addressing the key needs of van and campervan conversions. Designed for easy installation, it upholds the high UK quality standards you expect from Dodo Mat.

Lightweight yet highly effective for sound deadening and vibration damping, the Dodo Mat DEAD-EZY Deadening Roll is perfect for car, van and campervan owners seeking a quieter, smoother drive without adding unnecessary mass. Its advanced synthetic butyl core is engineered to deaden sound and dampen panel vibrations efficiently, without the excessive bulk of heavier alternatives. The distinctive top layer of the roll is specially designed to aid installation and conform easily to complex surfaces in your van or campervan, ensuring a clean and professional finish.

Product Name: Dodo Super Liner 6mm heat and sound insulation roll
Product Description:
Dodo Super Liner 6mm heat and sound insulation roll

Dodo Super Liner is an affordable, self-adhesive flexible foam liner, specifically developed to provide effective heat insulation and vibration damping when used over a base layer of sound deadening. Its advanced closed-cell foam structure is uniquely engineered by Dodo to deliver excellent thermal insulation, sound deadening and acoustic absorption, all within a compact 6mm (¼") profile—ideal for space-sensitive van or campervan installations.

When applied to your van or campervan, Dodo Super Liner acts as a high-performance thermal barrier, helping to stabilise cabin temperatures in both hot summers and cold winters. Dodo Super Liner also provides effective sound deadening and vibration damping, ensuring a more comfortable interior environment in your van or campervan year-round, whether you're on the move or parked up.

The Dodo Super Liner is designed for ease of use and versatility. Its self-adhesive backing simplifies installation, while the flexible yet durable foam maintains its shape under pressure and can be easily trimmed to fit around curves, contours, and tight spaces in your van or campervan. Suitable for application across a wide range of vehicle surfaces, it’s a practical choice for everything from campervan conversions to classic car restorations.

Additionally, Dodo Super Liner is water-resistant, tolerant to high temperatures, and meets UK vehicle flame-retardant safety standards—making it a reliable, long-lasting heat insulation, sound deadening and vibration damping solution that doesn’t compromise on the safety or performance of your van or campervan.

Product Name: Dodo Thermo Liner 6mm heat and sound insulation roll
Product Description:
Dodo Thermo Liner 6mm heat and sound insulation roll for vans and campervans

Dodo Mat are proud to announce the best selling Thermo Liner is now available in a new improved "Version 3" for your van or campervan. Available in a 3m x 1m roll and a 10m x 1m roll, the large 10m roll is suitable for a complete 4x4 van. They have upgraded the flexible closed cell elastomeric foam with improved thermal insulation, sound deadening and vibration damping performance. Dodo Thermo Liner v3 features a combination of low thermal conductivity and high water vapour diffusion resistance. The upgrades don't end there, the self-adhesive surface has been made rougher to improve its grip on the metal panels of your van or campervan and the release paper made stronger and easier to remove.

Dodo Thermo Liner is a classic best selling 6mm sound deadening, vibration damping and thermal insulation material for a quieter warmer, van, campervan or motorhome. Dodo Thermo Liner is a high grade foil lined nitrile closed cell foam and is ideal for use on the sides, floor, roof etc. of your van or campervan.

Dodo Thermo Liner is designed specifically for the UK vehicle market, and ensures effective sound deadening, vibration damping and thermal insulation. It will improve the comfort of any interior, but is perfect for campervans, van or campervan conversions, Land Rover and vehicle restorations.

Easily installed, the Dodo Thermo Liner will improve the cabin environment of your van or campervan. Temperatures will be controlled, warmer in the winter, cooler in the summer. Its effective thermal insulation, sound deadening and vibration damping make for a less tiring drive and your radio will sound clearer with less distortion.

Product Name: Dometic Forte 180 Ore Folding Camping Chair
Product Description:
Dometic Forte 180 Ore Folding Camping Chair

Relax with complete peace of mind when camping with the Dometic Forte 180 Ore Folding Camping Chair. This chair is perfect for campers who prioritise durability, comfort, and sustainability in their outdoor camping gear.

Crafted from robust, long-lasting materials, the Dometic Forte 180 Ore Folding Camping Chair can support an impressive 180 kg. Both the seat and backrest are made from REDUX polyester, a high-performance fabric spun from recycled materials. You can truly relax knowing your gear is helping the planet.

The Dometic Forte 180 Ore Folding Camping Chair combines rugged performance with clever design. Its powder-coated steel frame provides a rock-solid foundation, resisting rust and general wear and tear. The 1200D REDUX polyester isn't just tough and weather-resistant; it also significantly reduces environmental impact. With its extra-wide seat and high backrest, this chair offers superior support, making it ideal for those long, relaxing evenings around the campfire or all-day events.

Keeping your essentials close at hand is easy with the fold-out side table and its built-in cup holder. Plus, the Dometic Forte 180 Ore Folding Camping Chair includes a zipped storage pocket beneath the seat which provides a secure spot for valuables, smaller pieces of gear, or snacks while camping. When it's time to pack up, the chair quickly folds down into a flat, easy-to-carry shape.

Specifications

  • 180 kg loading capacity – reliable support for a wide range of users
  • 1200D REDUX polyester – made from recycled material, durable and eco-conscious
  • Powder-coated steel frame – strong, weather-resistant, and built to last
  • Fold-out side table – includes cup holder for added convenience
  • Zipped storage pocket – secure space for essentials or valuables
  • Wide seat and tall back – designed for long-lasting comfort
  • Folds flat – compact and easy to store or transport
  • Dimensions: 88 cm (W) x 56 cm (D) x 93 cm (H)
  • Net weight: 8.22 kg

Product Name: Mestic Ceramic Portable Heater MKK-230 UK
Product Description:
Mestic Ceramic Heater MKK-230 UK for Outdoor Camping, Campervans, Vans, Motorhomes, Caravans and Tents

Stay Cosy on Your Camping Adventures with the Mestic MKK-230 Ceramic Heater

Chilly evenings can put a damper on your camping trips, whether you're in a caravan, campervan, or tent. Don't let the dropping temperatures cut your fun short! The compact Mestic MKK-230 Ceramic Heater is your perfect companion, ensuring a constant and comfortable temperature so you can always enjoy an ideal climate.

Even Heat Distribution for Ultimate Comfort

Even if the daytime weather is lovely, evenings often bring a noticeable chill. That's when having an efficient electric heater becomes invaluable. The MKK-230 is designed for optimal warmth, featuring an infinitely adjustable thermostat and three heat settings, ranging from 500W to a powerful 1500W. Its hot air heating system works by warming an internal ceramic element, which then transfers heat to the airflow. What's more, the swivel function, combined with the built-in fan, ensures the warmth is distributed evenly throughout your space, meaning no cold spots! You'll never have to shiver again.

Safe and Reliable for Peace of Mind

When you're away from home, safety is paramount, and the MKK-230 delivers peace of mind. This lightweight heater is equipped with a tip-over switch that automatically shuts the unit off if it's accidentally knocked over. The touch protection grill prevents direct contact with the heating element, safeguarding against burns. A major advantage of ceramic heaters is their inherent safety; the ceramic plate requires less heat to warm up compared to traditional elements. This makes them more energy-efficient and a safer choice for families with children or pets.

Compact Design for Easy Portability

Weighing a mere 1.1 kilogrammes and measuring just 16.5 x 11.5 x 24 cm, this lightweight heater is incredibly compact and effortlessly portable. You'll always find a spot for it in your caravan, campervan, or tent, making it simple to move wherever warmth is needed most.

Main Advantages

Three heat settings: Choose from 500W, 1000W, or 1500W for tailored warmth.
Infinitely adjustable thermostat: Precisely control your desired temperature.
Rotating function with fan: Ensures even heat distribution throughout your space.
Touch and tip-over protection: Enhanced safety features for peace of mind.
Lightweight: Weighs just 1.1 kg, making it easy to move.
Compact dimensions: 16.5 x 11.5 x 24 cm (lxwxh) – perfect for small spaces.

The Mestic MKK-230 Ceramic Heater is an absolute essential for any camping holiday, promising cosy nights and a consistently pleasant climate. Don't let the evening chill cut your fun short; stay comfortably warm and make your camping adventures last even longer!

Product Name: Westfield Luna Plus Roll Out Full Caravan Awning
Product Description:
Westfield Luna Plus Caravan Roll Out Awnings

Full Caravan Porch Awning

The Westfield Luna Plus Awning is part of the Westfield Premium Plus Awning Series. Available in three different sizes, small, medium and large, to give you the most options when choosing your Roll Out Awnings. Set up as a full awning or porch awning by simply unrolling the awning from the side of your caravan and extending out the legs and roof bar to get set up. This watertight awning fits in the awning rail all the way around the van, suitable for all seasons with no chance of wind or rain getting in from the sides. This is a touring awning built for all seasons, making it highly versatile and suitable for sun, heat, cold, rain, snow, or whatever weather is thrown at it. 

The Luna Plus Small was designed to fit caravans between 946cm and 980cm, also requiring a minimum straight length rail of 510cm in length. The Luna Plus Medium has been made to fit caravans between 981cm and 1015cm, also requiring a minimum straight length rail of 540cm in length. The Luna Plus Large was created to fit caravans between 1016cm and 1050cm, also requiring a minimum straight length rail of 580cm in length. Made from high quality TenCate fabric, these awnings are highly waterproof, exceptionally durable and have a long lifespan. Additionally, this high quality waterproof material is lighter than other rival awnings, making it easy to set up without struggle. It also features the luxurious HyroTech Cotton Touch fabric on the walls giving amazing performance for year to come. The frame on this awning is made from aircraft grade aluminium for maximum strength and minimum weight, ensuring it is weather proof and as light as possible. The legs are also all adjustable which helps with uneven ground, making it easier to pitch when the ground isn't level. Featuring zipped blinds and tinted windows, giving you privacy when you want it.

Part of the Westfield Premium Plus Series, Westfield's top of the range, most innovative products. All products in this series are manufactured in Germany using premium materials from Ten Cate, Mehler AirTex and more. The best awning technology in the market, no one can out compete Westfield's Premium Plus Range. Featuring an Advanced Air System and HydroTech CottonTouch fabric, this range is Westfield's very best with the best performance.

Luna Awning Key Features:

  • Full caravan awning
  • All season performance
  • Lightweight and easy set-up
  • Suitable for touring
  • High quality material
  • Full ventilation panels for porch awning
  • Panoramic views
  • Tinted windows
  • Pano-doors

Product Name: Outdoor Revolution Twin Burner Camping Gas Stove & Grill
Product Description:
Outdoor Revolution Twin Burner Camping Gas Stove & Grill

The Outdoor Revolution Twin Burner Camping Gas Stove and Grill is the ideal camping companion due to its light weight and compact construction. Make cleaning your van or campervan a breeze with the Mestic MS-80 vacuum cleaner. Designed for convenience, this compact vacuum plugs directly into the 12V socket in your van or campervan, allowing you to tidy up quickly while on the go.

Thanks to its powerful suction and versatile nozzles, the Mestic MS-80 vacuum cleaner makes it easy to clear away dust, crumbs, and debris from yourvan or campervan. Whether you’re tackling upholstery, furniture, or hard-to-reach corners, the Mestic MS-80 vacuum cleaner is the perfect solution for a clean and comfortable travel space.

Mestic MWC-80 1L Travel Kettle – Black

Boiling water on your camping trip has never been easier with the Mestic MWC-80 1L travel kettle. Compact, lightweight, and efficient, this travel kettle quickly boils up to 1L of water with just the push of a button.

Designed for on-the-go convenience, the Mestic MWC-80 1L travel kettle features an ergonomic handle and a sleek black finish, making it ideal for camping. The Mestic MWC-80 1L travel kettle has an indicator light to let you know when the water has reached the perfect temperature, and the automatic shut-off function ensures it turns off once the water boils. Additionally, the boil-dry protection feature automatically switches off the heating element if there’s no water left in the kettle.

Its 1L capacity lets you make up to four cups of tea while you are camping, and its small size ensures it won’t take up much space in your gear. The Mestic MWC-80 1L travel kettle combines practicality and safety, making it the perfect companion for boiling water on your camping adventures.

Product Description:
Mestic Cool Box Thermoelectric MTEC-25 AC/DC

Weighing just 4kg, the Mestic Cool Box Thermoelectric MTEC-25 AC/DC is perfect for day trips. It cools to 20°C below ambient temperature, making it suitable for holiday destinations with mild temperatures. Whether on the road or at the destination, the Mestic Cool Box Thermoelectric MTEC-25 AC/DC keeps up to 23L of contents cool.

Mestic Thermoelectric cool box 12V and 230V

Going on a day trip or holiday to a destination with milder temperatures? Then the Mestic Cool Box Thermoelectric MTEC-25 AC/DC is right for you! Weighing only 4 kg, you can easily take it with you to the beach or a picnic, for example. The portable electric cool box with 12V and 230V connection cools up to 20°C below ambient temperature. Thanks to high-quality insulation, the achieved temperature is maintained for a long time. The cooling capacity of the Mestic Cool Box Thermoelectric MTEC-25 AC/DC is also suitable for mild summers. However, it is recommended to have drinks and food already cooled when you place them in the cool box. That is how you make the most of the cooling power and save energy. This cool box also features an energy-saving eco mode.

Main benefits

  • Cools up to 20°C below ambient temperature
  • Perfect for day trips and mild summers
  • With 12V and 230V connection
  • Eco mode for lower power consumption
  • Capacity: 23L (suitable for 1L bottles)

Keep it cool: 20°C below ambient temperature

Your holiday or day trip starts on the road! Enjoy cool drinks and fresh food even in the car with the Mestic Cool Box Thermoelectric MTEC-25 AC/DC. The thermoelectric cool box keeps up to 23L of contents cool and works on both 12V and 230V. So it works great as a car cooler with the included car plug. With its compact size, the Mestic cool box takes up little precious space. Once you arrive at your destination, plug it into 230V. This will keep all your food and drinks wonderfully cool. Would you rather keep some snacks warm? Then set the switch to 'hot' to set the cool box to heat.

The Mestic Cool Box Thermoelectric MTEC-25 AC/DC is compact and easy to carry thanks to its light weight. It is the ideal cooler for day trips and it can function as a fridge at your holiday destination in milder temperatures. Enjoy deliciously refreshing drinks under the sun!

Product Name: Westfield Pluto 2.0 Caravan Air Full Awning
Product Description:
Westfield Pluto 2.0 Caravan Air Full Awning

Inflatable Full Awing

The Westfield Pluto 2.0 Full Caravan Awning is a luxury inflatable awning designed to withstand the elements. Available in a range of sizes including XS, S, M, L, XL, XXL. Created from high-quality, durable Hydrotech fabric material with HydraDore XT PRO high end double coating for the highest waterproof rating and protection from the sun. With a waterproof rating of 10,000mm, you can ensure you'll stay dry sheltered by this awning even in the harshest rain. The Westfield Pluto Awning runs across the whole length of your caravan. This ensures that all windows, doors and service flaps are easy to open by ensuring a perfect seal on the sides of your caravan to prevent wind and rain from getting in.

Featuring an Advanced Air System that uses a single point of inflation to allow you to set up your awning with ease. Additionally, the Pluto Air Awning can be deflated from this valve to allow you to take it down easily. This awning is annex ready, meaning you can fit at least one annex for additional storage space, or combine this with the annex inner tent to give yourself extra living and sleeping space. To install the annex simply pitch your awning as normal and use the built in zip to attach the annex onto the side of your awning, pump it up and peg! Simple.

Part of the Westfield Premium Series, this awning features three-layer air tubes and a unique AAS System, with which the air awning is inflated at a single point, allowing a quick and easy setup. Utilising Hydrotech CottonTouch fabric with its anti-condensation performance, amazing weather resistance and UV stability, no other awning could compete. With user-friendly features, premium materials and advanced technology there is no other awning like this on the market.

Pluto 2.0 Awning Key Features:

  • Draught skirt and wheel cover with ventilation panel
  • Hydrotech cotton touch fabric
  • Breathable fabric to avoid condensation with built-in ventilation in front and side panels
  • Advanced Air System and Super-Tubes with single inflation for easy setup
  • Added protection against harsh weather
  • Double mudwall for protection inside and out
  • Reflective storm straps with strap tidy pockets
  • Full front canopy for protection against the rain
  • Unique windows for maximum light and beautiful views
  • Compatible with annex for extended living space
  • Carry bag included for storage and travel

Product Description:
Mestic Ceramic Heater MKK-100

Stay warm and cozy camping wherever you are with the Mestic Ceramic Heater MKK-100. Its compact, lightweight design makes it easy to take with you on camping trips, in your camper, or even in a tent. You'll be enjoying a comfortable temperature in no time!

Compact Heater with Two Heat Settings

Perfect for your camper, caravan, or tent, the Mestic Ceramic Heater MKK-100 ensures you stay comfortable while camping even on chilly nights. This ceramic heater works by heating the air with its ceramic element, which is then circulated by a fan to distribute warmth throughout the room. Choose your desired temperature with two heat settings: 750W for a gentle warmth or 1500W for a more powerful heat. The Mestic Ceramic Heater MKK-100 also has a fan-only mode for when you just need a bit of air circulation, making it versatile for any season. Despite its compact size, this heater delivers an impressive amount of heat!

Key Features:

  • Heating capacity: 1.5 kW
  • Two heat settings: 750W and 1500W
  • Overheating, tip-over, and touch protection
  • Dimensions: 19 x 17 x 26 cm (L x W x H)
  • Voltage: 220-240V
  • Weight: just 1.25 kg

Safety Features for Peace of Mind

The Mestic Ceramic Heater MKK-100 isn’t just powerful; it’s also designed with safety in mind. At just 1.25kg and 19cm x 17cm x 26cm in size, this heater is easy to move and store. It's a perfect camping product for tight spaces like tents or campers. Thanks to its built-in protection features, it automatically switches off if it tips over, gets too hot, or if it’s touched in the wrong way. This makes it both a reliable and worry-free option for heating spaces while camping.

The Mestic Ceramic Heater MKK-100 is a must-have for your camping gear. With two adjustable heat settings, a compact design, and built-in safety features, it keeps you warm and safe wherever you go. Whether you're camping in your camper, tent, or staying at home, this powerful little Mestic heater is perfect for making your evenings cozy.

Specifications

  • Article number: 1518240
  • Connection voltage: 220V-240V
  • Dimensions (lxwxh): 19cm x 17cm x 26cm
  • EAN-code: 2000011050221
  • Weigth: 1.2kg
  • Colour: Black
  • Fall protection: Yes
  • Oscillation function: No
  • Heating type: Hot air
  • Ventilation function: Yes
  • Heating levels: 750W/1500W

Product Name: Mestic Cool Box Compressor MCCP-90 AC/DC Dual Zone
Product Description:
Mestic MCCP-90 Dual Zone Cool Box Compressor (AC/DC)

The Mestic MCCP-90 Dual Zone Cool Box Compressor (AC/DC) combines the best of both a freezer and refrigerator. With two large compartments, you can cool and freeze independently. Control each zone's temperature digitally, with settings ranging from -18°C to +10°C.

Two Temperature Zones for Versatility

As part of Mestic’s Performance line, the MCCP-90 Dual Zone Cool Box Compressor (AC/DC) is designed for reliability, featuring advanced compressor technology and durable insulation. Whether you’re at a campsite or on the road, the optional eco setting keeps energy consumption low. The two equally-sized compartments offer a combined capacity of 90L, making it perfect for large families and accommodating 1.5L bottles. Each compartment of the Mestic MCCP-90 Dual Zone Cool Box Compressor (AC/DC) can be set to different temperatures, allowing you to cool and freeze simultaneously. Adjust the temperature via the easy-to-use digital display between -18°C and +10°C.

Key Features

  • Dual zones for separate cooling and freezing
  • Temperature range from -18°C to +10°C
  • Digital display with two USB ports
  • Dual 12V - 24V and 100V - 240V power compatibility
  • Two-way lid opening for easy access
  • 90L capacity, ideal for large loads

Ideal for On-the-Go and Your Destination

At Mestic, we prioritize convenience. The Mestic MCCP-90 Dual Zone Cool Box Compressor (AC/DC) is equipped with dual 12V - 24V connections (one on each side), making it easy to power up no matter where you are. The lid opens from both sides and can be fully removed for hassle-free access. Plus, with the integrated 12V - 24V and 100V - 240V connections, you don’t need a separate 230V adapter. Additional features of the Mestic MCCP-90 Dual Zone Cool Box Compressor (AC/DC) include two removable wire baskets and interior lighting for added practicality.

Why Choose the Mestic MCCP-90 Dual Zone Cool Box Compressor (AC/DC)?

If you're looking for a reliable, high-capacity cooler, the Mestic MCCP-90 Dual Zone Cool Box Compressor (AC/DC) delivers. With 90L capacity, dual-zone cooling and freezing, and powerful compressor technology, this model is perfect for long trips or extended stays. You’ll get all the essential power cables and a cooler designed for ease of use, no matter where your adventures take you.

Specifications
